na cāpi vāsanāmātrāl liṅgajñānasya sambhavaḥ | liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpāl liṅgato na tat || 5,5.167 ||

p.5, l.5.168

tatrābhāvasya liṅgatvaṃ na cāsāv ānumānikaḥ | pramāṇāntaragamyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate || 5,5.168 ||

p.5, l.5.169

pratyakṣāvagatāl liṅgād yasya liṅgigatir bhavet | tasya nāto 'dhikaṃ kiñ cit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate || 5,5.169 ||

p.5, l.5.170

yatrāpy anumitāl liṅgāl liṅgini grahaṇaṃ bhavet | tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣād eva gamyate || 5,5.170 ||

p.5, l.5.171

liṅgatvaṃ kṛtakatvādau kriyāyāḥ kārakasya vā | pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭam iti dūraṃ na gamyate || 5,5.171 ||

p.5, l.5.172

evaṃ śabdopamānādau sāmānyāśrayatā yataḥ | taddaussthityena daussthityaṃ sarvatrātaḥ prasajyate || 5,5.172 ||

p.5, l.5.173

tasmāt pratyakṣapūrvatvaṃ pramāṇāntara iṣyate | pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyathā hi gatir bhavet || 5,5.173 ||

p.5, l.5.174

pratyakṣālambanatvaṃ ca viśeṣasya kathaṃ bhavet | yadā vastvantarāpekṣaḥ sāmānyāṃśaḥ sa kīrtyate || 5,5.174 ||

p.5, l.5.175

rūpādayo hi sāmānyaṃ sarve nīlādyapekṣayā | svaviśeṣānapekṣyātha nīlādīnāṃ samānatā || 5,5.175 ||

p.5, l.5.176

te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syuḥ paramāṇavaḥ | dvyaṇukasyāpi yadrūpaṃ tad dhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ || 5,5.176 ||

p.5, l.5.177

na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāro 'sti kasya cit | na ca pratyakṣatā tasya saṅghāte kevalasya vā || 5,5.177 ||

p.5, l.5.178

bhedenāgṛhyamāṇasya nābhedo grāhyatāṃ vrajet | na ca bhinneṣv abhinnatvabuddher grāhyatvasambhavaḥ || 5,5.178 ||

p.5, l.5.179

samudāyo na vāpy asti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā | sarveṣām asatārthena pratyayotpattisambhavaḥ || 5,5.179 ||

p.5, l.5.180

na caikajātiyogena vināsti samudāyatā | samudāye 'pi cāṇutvaṃ naiteṣām apagacchati || 5,5.180 ||

p.5, l.5.181

sāmānyam ity adṛśye 'pi tena sāmānya eva naḥ | vyāsaṅginī bhavaty eṣā dhīrvināpy ekakalpanāt || 5,5.181 ||

p.5, l.5.182

vyāsajya vartamānasya sāmānyasya yathendriyaiḥ | grahaṇaṃ tadvad eva syāt prativyaktiniveśinaḥ || 5,5.182 ||

p.5, l.5.183

mīmāṃsakaiś ca nāvaśyam iṣyante paramāṇavaḥ | yadbalenopalabdhasya mithyātvaṃ kalpayed bhavān || 5,5.183 ||

p.5, l.5.184

samūharūpaṃ pratyakṣam adṛśyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ | yo 'pahnute śaśasyāpi so 'bhāvaṃ śṛṅgato vadet || 5,5.184 ||

p.5, l.5.185

samūhaparamārthatve sthite tatsiddhihetukā | yadi nāmāvagamyeta paramāṇvastitā punaḥ || 5,5.185 ||

p.5, l.5.186

tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā | tat tathaivābhyupetavyaṃ sāmānyam atha vetarat || 5,5.186 ||

p.5, l.5.187

sattādisāmānyam apekṣya sarvaṃ gotvādi sādhāraṇatām upaiti | tasmād asādhāraṇam akṣagamyaṃ vadan na sāmānyam apahnuvīta || 5,5.187 ||

p.5, l.5.188

sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet, kiṃ vāstyasādhāraṇabuddhir atra | yadvastu lokaḥ pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tacchaktyata eva vaktum || 5,5.188 ||

§ 5,6 śabdapariccheda SBP

p.5, l.6.1

    • pratyakṣādiṣu vaktavyaṃ śabdamātrasya lakṣaṇam |
    • adatitvariteneha kiṃ śāstrād abhidhīyate || 5,6.1 ||
    • (p.288)sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tyaktvā viśeṣasyaiva lakṣaṇam |
    • na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktum ito 'py asya na vācyatā || 5,6.2 ||
    • yac coktaṃ śabdavijñānād arthe jñānam itīdṛśamūm |
    • aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tacchāstrasya lakṣaṇam || 5,6.3 ||
    • pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā nityena kṛtakena vā |
    • puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyeta tacchāstram abhidhīyate || 5,6.4 ||
    • svarūpakathanaṃ yat tu kasya cit tatra dṛśyate |
    • tadaṅgatvena tasyāpi śāstratvam avagamyate || 5,6.5 ||
    • bhāvanāyāṃ samastāyāṃ vākyād evopajāyate |
    • pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā tacchāstraṃ na padād yataḥ || 5,6.6 ||
    • aparīkṣāmiṣeṇāpi lakṣaṇāni vadannayam |
    • na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati || 5,6.7 ||
    • tatra yallokavākyasthaṃ kathayecchabdalakṣaṇam |
    • vedaṃ vyākhyātukāmasya tannātīvopayujyate || 5,6.8 ||
    • (p.289)pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ tu varṇamātrāditaḥ puraḥ |
    • śāstrārthajñānavelāyāṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam || 5,6.9 ||
    • yat tu gāmānayetyādivākyasthaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam |
    • tasya nehopayogo 'sti tasmāc chāstragataṃ kṛtam || 5,6.10 ||
    • veśeṣaś ca na sāmānyam antareṇāsti kaś cana |
    • tasmāt tam apy udāhṛtya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham || 5,6.11 ||
    • sāmānyarūpam apy etadadhikārād viśiṣyate |
    • (p.290)codanā copadeśaś ca śāstram evety udāhṛtam || 5,6.12 ||
    • yathā ca codanāśabdo vaidikyām eva vartate |
    • śabdajñānārthavijñānaśabdau śāstre tathā sthitau || 5,6.13 ||
    • pratyakṣādyaparīkṣyatve tadantarbhāvahetukam |
    • śāstrasyāpy aparīkṣyatvamanayaiva dhiyoditam || 5,6.14 ||
    • tatrānumānam evedaṃ bauddhair vaiśeṣikaiḥ śritam |
    • bhedaḥ sāṃkhyādibhis tv iṣṭo na tūktaṃ bhedakāraṇam || 5,6.15 ||
    • pūrvasaṃskārayuktāntyavarṇavākyādikalpanā |
    • vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstīty etena bhinnatā || 5,6.16 ||
    • yair uktā tatra vaidharmyavikalpasamajātitā |
    • (p.291)dhūmānityaviṣāṇyādiviśeṣān na hi bhinnatā || 5,6.17 ||
    • tailakṣaṇyaparityāgo yāvan na pratipādyate |
    • tāvad viśeṣamātreṇa vadato jātitā bhavet || 5,6.18 ||
    • yatheṣṭaviniyogena pratītir yāpi śabdataḥ |
    • na dhūmāder itīhāpi vyabhicāro 'ṅgavṛttibhiḥ || 5,6.19 ||
    • hastasaṃjñādayo ye 'pi yadarthapratipādane |
    • bhaveyuḥ kṛtasaṅketāste na liṅgam iti sthitiḥ || 5,6.20 ||
    • (p.292)puruṣākṣiptatāyāṃ ca tathaiva vyabhicāritā |
    • padavaidikavākyānāṃ na satyavyāpitā bhavet || 5,6.21 ||
    • sambandhātubhavaś cāyaṃ so 'nyatrāpi vilakṣaṇaḥ |
    • etasmin puruṣāpekṣā deśāpekṣāgnidhūmayoḥ || 5,6.22 ||
    • kālādyapekṣayā cānyaḥ, uktā cānyair abhinnatā |
    • āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyād anumānataḥ || 5,6.23 ||
    • na cāpūrvādiśabdānāṃ bhedāt sarvatra bhinnatā |
    • na cehāśvādiśabdebhyo bhedas teṣāṃ pratīyate || 5,6.24 ||
    • na cāpy ajñātasambandhaṃ padaṃ kiñ cit prakāśakam |
    • sambandhān anubhūtyāto na syād ananumānatā || 5,6.25 ||
    • (p.293)tulyākāratayāpy atra śabdajñānārthataddhiyām |
    • agnidhūmeṣv adṛṣṭatvān na bhedas tannivāraṇāt || 5,6.26 ||
    • pratibimbeṣv anaikānto bimbaṃ yādṛgghi darpaṇe |
    • tādṛṅ mukhādi budhyante, na cātrānanumānatā || 5,6.27 ||
    • pratyakṣatā tadāpy atra tadānyair vyabhicāritā |
    • yatra pādādi bambena gatānām anumīyate || 5,6.28 ||
    • ekavākyāt sakṛc coktān nāpy anekasya tatkṣaṇam |
    • syād viruddhāviruddhasya bodhād etasya bhinnatā || 5,6.29 ||
    • liṅgasyāpi hi tādrūpyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuviruddhayoḥ |
    • (p.294)virodhān nānumānaṃ cet, syād anāgamatāpi te || 5,6.30 ||
    • yatra caikārthatā vākye tatra syād anumānatā |
    • sakṛduccarite cāsmin vivakṣaikaiva dṛśyate || 5,6.31 ||
    • yas tv anirdhāritārthānām anekapratibhodbhavaḥ |
    • sa liṅge 'py asphuṭe dṛṣṭas tasmān naitena bhidyate || 5,6.32 ||
    • dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ ca dhūmādau vyabhicāritam |
    • prasiddhatvād dhi tatrāpi na dṛṣṭānto 'bhidhīyate || 5,6.33 ||
    • anabhyas te tv apekṣante śabde sambandhinaḥ smṛtim |
    • atra pratyukta ity evaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kva cit || 5,6.34 ||
    • paroktā hetavaś cātra nābhedasya nivāritāḥ |
    • śabdānumānayor aikyaṃ dhūmād agnyanumānavat || 5,6.35 ||
    • anvayavyatirekābhyām ekapratyakṣadarśanāt |
    • sambandhapūrvakatvāc ca pratipattir ito yataḥ || 5,6.36 ||
    • pratyakṣānyapramāṇatvāt tadadṛṣṭārthabodhanāt |
    • sāmānyaviṣayatvāc ca traikālyaviṣayāśrayāt || 5,6.37 ||
    • (p.295)kaiś cin mīmāṃsakair ukto bhedo 'tra viṣayāntarāt |
    • pūrvābhyāṃ hy aparicchinne śāstram arthe pravartate || 5,6.38 ||
    • tatrāpi nāgamatvaṃ syāt puruṣokte, tathās tu cet |
    • pratyayaḥ kin nimitto 'rthe, vaktṛbuddheḥ, kuto nv asau || 5,6.39 ||
    • na śabdārthasya sāliṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syāḥ kathañ cana |
    • viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā || 5,6.40 ||
    • tena vaktur abhiprāye pratyakṣādyanirūpite |
    • puruṣoktir api śroturāgamatvaṃ prapadyate || 5,6.41 ||
    • na cāpy ananumeyatvam āgamārthasya śakyate |
    • (p.296)liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gner iva kalpyate || 5,6.42 ||
    • na cāpy ananumeyatvāt pramāṇāntaragamyatā |
    • rūpasyāśrāvaṇatvena na hy apratyakṣateṣyate || 5,6.43 ||
    • evaṃ sati svayūthyā na ke cin nātiprapañcinaḥ |
    • anumānaviśeṣo 'yam īdṛg dharmasya bodhakaḥ || 5,6.44 ||
    • bhaviṣyatyartharūpaṃ tu liṅgaṃ dharme nirākṛtam |
    • saṃjñānumānatecchā tu na duṣyedāgame 'pi naḥ || 5,6.45 ||
    • lakṣaṇena tv abhinnatvaṃ yadi śabdānumānayoḥ |
    • vedajñānāpramāṇatvaṃ syād atallakṣaṇatvataḥ || 5,6.46 ||
    • āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyān nṛvacassu hi |
    • lakṣaṇenānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhimṛcchati || 5,6.47 ||
    • vede tv āptanarābhāvāt sambandhānubhavād ṛte |
    • lakṣaṇaṃ nānumānasyety aprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate || 5,6.48 ||
    • (p.297)nanv ekadeśasatyatve tasya syād anumānatā |
    • vedatvād agnihotrādau vāyukṣepiṣṭhavākyavat || 5,6.49 ||
    • nādityayūpe 'naikāntāt, tadvad vā gauṇatā bhavet |
    • nātaḥ pratyanumānānām evaṃ pūrvoktayā viśā || 5,6.50 ||
    • tasmāl lakṣaṇabhedena yadi śabdapramāṇatā |
    • samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā || 5,6.51 ||
    • tena cāptopadeśatvaṃ na syād āgamalakṣaṇam |
    • nāptasya sambhavo vede, loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā || 5,6.52 ||
    • purastād varṇitaṃ hy etat, tasmāc chabdena yā matiḥ |
    • (p.298)tasyāḥ svataḥ pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syād doṣadarśanam || 5,6.53 ||
    • anumānena caitasya prāmāṇyaṃ kevalaṃ samam |
    • pade tāvat kṛto yatnaḥ parair ity atra varṇyate || 5,6.54 ||
    • viṣayo 'nyādṛśas tāvad dṛśyate liṅgaśabdayoḥ |
    • sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca padasya sthāpayiṣyati || 5,6.55 ||
    • dharmādharmaviśiṣṭaś ca liṅgīty etac ca sādhitam |
    • na tāvad anumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat || 5,6.56 ||
    • sāmānyād atiriktaṃ tu śābde vākyasya gocaraḥ |
    • sāmarthyād anumeyatvād aśrute 'pi padāntare || 5,6.57 ||
    • saṃkhyādimān padārthaś cet, na tāvat so 'vyayādiṣu |
    • yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakter viśeṣaṇam || 5,6.58 ||
    • padāntarābhidheyasya tādarthyāc ca kriyātmanaḥ |
    • (p.299)vākyārthe 'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate || 5,6.59 ||
    • saty apy atra viśeṣṭatve siddhatvān naiva pakṣatā |
    • tāvān eva hi tatrārtho yaḥ pūrvam avadhāritaḥ || 5,6.60 ||
    • bhedabuddheś ca vaiṣamyaṃ prakṛtipratyayārthayoḥ |
    • viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyārthasvātantryagrahaṇaṃ na ca || 5,6.61 ||
    • viśeṣyapūrvikā tatra buddhiś cātra viparyayaḥ |
    • atha śabdo 'rthavattvena pakṣaḥ kasmān na kalpyate || 5,6.62 ||
    • pratijñārthaikadeśo hi hetus tatra prasajyate |
    • pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe ca sāmānyaṃ hetur iṣyate || 5,6.63 ||
    • śabdatvaṃ gamakaṃ nātra gośabdatvaṃ niṣetsyate |
    • (p.300)vyaktir eva viśiṣyāto hetuś caikā prasajyate || 5,6.64 ||
    • bhaved vyañjakabhedāc cet, na tv evaṃ pratyayo 'sti naḥ |
    • kathaṃ cāsya viśiṣṭatvaṃ na tāvad deśakālataḥ || 5,6.65 ||
    • tatpratītiviśiṣṭaś cet, paraṃ kim anumīyate |
    • na pratyāyanaśaktiś ca viśeṣasyānumīyate || 5,6.66 ||
    • viśeṣāṇāṃ na śaktir hi saikadeśe 'gnijātivat |
    • sāmānyasyaiva śaktatvaṃ pakṣo hetus tad eva ca || 5,6.67 ||
    • (p.301)tasmād arthaviśiṣṭasya na śabdasyānumeyatā |
    • kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirūpyate || 5,6.68 ||
    • na kriyākartṛsambandhād ṛte sambandhanaṃ kva cit |
    • rājā bharttā manuṣyasya tena rājñaḥ sa ucyate || 5,6.69 ||
    • vṛkṣas tiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tāḥ |
    • deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati || 5,6.70 ||
    • kāryakāraṇabhāvādau kriyā sarvatra vidyate |
    • na cānavagatākāraḥ sambandho 'stīti gamyate || 5,6.71 ||
    • na cāsty asati sambandhe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo 'pi vā |
    • tasmān na pakṣadharmo 'yam iti śakyā nirūpaṇā || 5,6.72 ||
    • nivṛtte 'nyatra sambandhe ye 'pi tadviṣayātmanā |
    • vadeyuḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyānupalabdhivat || 5,6.73 ||
    • tair apy etannirūpyaṃ tu śabdas tadviṣayaḥ katham |
    • na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā || 5,6.74 ||
    • tasmād utpādayaty eṣa yato 'rthaviṣayā matim |
    • tena tadviṣayaḥ śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā || 5,6.75 ||
    • (p.302)tatra vācakatāyāṃ ca siddhāyāṃ pakṣadharmatā |
    • na pratītyaṅgatāṃ gacchen na caivam anumānatā || 5,6.76 ||
    • gamakatvāc ca dharmatvaṃ dharmatvād gamako yadi |
    • syād anyonyāśrayatvaṃ hi tasmān naiṣāpi kalpanā || 5,6.77 ||
    • na cāgṛhītasambandhāḥ svarūpavyatirekataḥ |
    • śabdaṃ jānanti yenātra pakṣadharmamatir bhavet || 5,6.78 ||
    • na ca svarūpamātreṇa dhūmādeḥ pakṣadharmatā |
    • na cāpi pūrvasambandham apekṣyaiṣā prasajyate || 5,6.79 ||
    • dhūmavān ayam ity evam apūrvasyāpi jāyate |
    • pakṣadharmamatiḥ, tena bhidyetottaralakṣaṇāt || 5,6.80 ||
    • na tv atra pūrvasambandhād adhikā pakṣadharmatā |
    • (p.303)na cārthapratyayāt pūrvam ity anaṅgam iyaṃ bhavet || 5,6.81 ||
    • na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet |
    • parvatādir yathā deśaḥ prāgdharmatvāvadhāraṇāt || 5,6.82 ||
    • yaś cātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva naḥ |
    • na cānavadhṛte tasmiṃs taddharmatvāvadhāraṇam || 5,6.83 ||
    • prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhītaḥ kiṃ tataḥ param |
    • paṣadharmādibhir jñātair yena syād anumānitā || 5,6.84 ||
    • anvayo na ca śabdasya prameyeṇa nirūpyate |
    • vyāpāreṇa hi sarveṣām anvitatvaṃ pratīyate || 5,6.85 ||
    • yatra dhūmo 'sti tatrāgner astitvenānvayaḥ sphuṭaḥ |
    • na tv evaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścayaḥ || 5,6.86 ||
    • na tāvat tatra deśe 'sau tatkāle vāvagamyate |
    • bhaven nityavibhutvāc cet, sarvārtheṣu ca tat samam || 5,6.87 ||
    • tena sarvatra dṛṣṭatvād vyatirekasya cāgateḥ |
    • sarvaśabdair aśeṣārthapratipattiḥ prasajyate || 5,6.88 ||
    • (p.304)athaivaṃ deśakālābhyām asatyatvaprakalpane |
    • vācakapratyayaṃ kaś cid brūyād arthadhiyānvitam || 5,6.89 ||
    • naivam apy asti dṛṣṭo hi vināpy arthadhiyā kva cit |
    • vācakapratyayo 'smābhir avyutpannanarān prati || 5,6.90 ||
    • dvitīyādiprayoge ca bhaved anvayakalpanā |
    • śatakṛtvaḥ prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhīḥ kva cit || 5,6.91 ||
    • nanu ye jñātasambandhās teṣāṃ dṛṣṭo 'nvayaḥ sphuṭaḥ |
    • yady evam anvayāt pūrvaṃ sambandhaḥ ko 'pi kalpitaḥ || 5,6.92 ||
    • nāṅgam arthadhiyām eṣā bhaved anvayakalpanā |
    • anvayādhīnajanmatvam anumānasya ca sthitam || 5,6.93 ||
    • jñāte pratītisāmarthye tadvaśād eva jāyate |
    • paścād anvaya ity eṣa kāraṇaṃ katham ucyate || 5,6.94 ||
    • tasmāt tannirapekṣaiva śabdaśaktiḥ pratīyate |
    • (p.305)na ca dhūmānvayāt pūrvaṃ śaktatvam avagamyate || 5,6.95 ||
    • vyatireko 'py avijñātād arthāc chabdadhiyau yadi |
    • so 'pi paścāt sthitatvena nārthapratyayasādhanam || 5,6.96 ||
    • sambandhaṃ yaṃ tu vakṣyāmastasya nirṇayakāraṇam |
    • syād anvayo 'tirekaś ca na tv arthādhigamasya tau || 5,6.97 ||
    • tasmād ananumānatvaṃ cābde pratyakṣavad bhavet |
    • trairūpyarahitatvena tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt || 5,6.98 ||
    • sati cāsya pramāṇatve bhedābhedanirūpanā |
    • yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramīyate || 5,6.99 ||
    • (p.306)padaṃ prayujyamānaṃ hi caturddhārthe prayujyate |
    • pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā || 5,6.100 ||
    • tatra yat pūrvavijñāte pratyakṣe ca prayujyate |
    • pramite ca prayuktatvād anuvādo 'dhikād vinā || 5,6.101 ||
    • adṛṣṭapūrve tv ajñānaṃ sambandhapratyayo 'pi vā |
    • sambandho na ca tasyārthaḥ, yo 'rthaḥ sa tv anyagocaraḥ || 5,6.102 ||
    • parokṣe 'nanubhūte ca nābhidheye matir bhavet |
    • parokṣaś cānubhūtaś ca yas tatra smṛtir iṣyate || 5,6.103 ||
    • pramite ca pravṛttatvāt smṛter nāsti pramāṇatā |
    • paricchedaphalatvād dhi prāmāṇyam upajāyate || 5,6.104 ||
    • tādātvikaparicchedaphalatvena pramāṇatā |
    • pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛter api na kalpyate || 5,6.105 ||
    • yāvān pūrvaparicchinnas tāvān evāvadhāryate |
    • smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadāsattve 'sya naiva dhīḥ || 5,6.106 ||
    • padam abhyadhikābhāvāt smārakān na viśiṣyate |
    • padādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñ cit tatpadasya na gocaraḥ || 5,6.107 ||
    • (p.307)pramāṇam anumānaṃ vā yady api syāt padānmitiḥ |
    • vākyārthasyāgamārthatvād doṣo nāgamavādinām || 5,6.108 ||
    • vākyārthe tu padārthebhyaḥ sambandhānubhavād ṛte |
    • buddhir utpadyate tena bhinnā 'sāvakṣabuddhivat || 5,6.109 ||
    • vākyādhikaraṇe cāsya hetoḥ siddhir bhaviṣyati |
    • sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyabuddhāvasiddhatā || 5,6.110 ||
    • vākyeṣv adṛṣṭeṣv api sārthakeṣu padārthavinmātratayā pratītim |
    • dṛṣṭvānumānavyatirekabhītāḥ kliṣṭāḥ padābhedavicāraṇāyām || 5,6.111 ||
pratyakṣādiṣu vaktavyaṃ śabdamātrasya lakṣaṇam | adatitvariteneha kiṃ śāstrād abhidhīyate || 5,6.1 ||

p.5, l.6.2

sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tyaktvā viśeṣasyaiva lakṣaṇam | na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktum ito 'py asya na vācyatā || 5,6.2 ||

p.5, l.6.3

yac coktaṃ śabdavijñānād arthe jñānam itīdṛśam | aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tacchāstrasya lakṣaṇam || 5,6.3 ||

p.5, l.6.4

pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā nityena kṛtakena vā | puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyeta tacchāstram abhidhīyate || 5,6.4 ||

p.5, l.6.5

svarūpakathanaṃ yat tu kasya cit tatra dṛśyate | tadaṅgatvena tasyāpi śāstratvam avagamyate || 5,6.5 ||

p.5, l.6.6

bhāvanāyāṃ samastāyāṃ vākyād evopajāyate | pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā tacchāstraṃ na padād yataḥ || 5,6.6 ||

p.5, l.6.7

aparīkṣāmiṣeṇāpi lakṣaṇāni vadannayam | na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati || 5,6.7 ||

p.5, l.6.8

tatra yallokavākyasthaṃ kathayecchabdalakṣaṇam | vedaṃ vyākhyātukāmasya tannātīvopayujyate || 5,6.8 ||

p.5, l.6.9

pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ tu varṇamātrāditaḥ puraḥ | śāstrārthajñānavelāyāṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam || 5,6.9 ||

p.5, l.6.10

yat tu gāmānayetyādivākyasthaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam | tasya nehopayogo 'sti tasmāc chāstragataṃ kṛtam || 5,6.10 ||

p.5, l.6.11

veśeṣaś ca na sāmānyam antareṇāsti kaś cana | tasmāt tam apy udāhṛtya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham || 5,6.11 ||

p.5, l.6.12

sāmānyarūpam apy etadadhikārād viśiṣyate | codanā copadeśaś ca śāstram evety udāhṛtam || 5,6.12 ||

p.5, l.6.13

yathā ca codanāśabdo vaidikyām eva vartate | śabdajñānārthavijñānaśabdau śāstre tathā sthitau || 5,6.13 ||

p.5, l.6.14

pratyakṣādyaparīkṣyatve tadantarbhāvahetukam | śāstrasyāpy aparīkṣyatvamanayaiva dhiyoditam || 5,6.14 ||

p.5, l.6.15

tatrānumānam evedaṃ bauddhair vaiśeṣikaiḥ śritam | bhedaḥ sāṃkhyādibhis tv iṣṭo na tūktaṃ bhedakāraṇam || 5,6.15 ||

p.5, l.6.16

pūrvasaṃskārayuktāntyavarṇavākyādikalpanā | vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstīty etena bhinnatā || 5,6.16 ||

p.5, l.6.17

yair uktā tatra vaidharmyavikalpasamajātitā | dhūmānityaviṣāṇyādiviśeṣān na hi bhinnatā || 5,6.17 ||

p.5, l.6.18

tailakṣaṇyaparityāgo yāvan na pratipādyate | tāvad viśeṣamātreṇa vadato jātitā bhavet || 5,6.18 ||

p.5, l.6.19

yatheṣṭaviniyogena pratītir yāpi śabdataḥ | na dhūmāder itīhāpi vyabhicāro 'ṅgavṛttibhiḥ || 5,6.19 ||

p.5, l.6.20

hastasaṃjñādayo ye 'pi yadarthapratipādane | bhaveyuḥ kṛtasaṅketāste na liṅgam iti sthitiḥ || 5,6.20 ||

p.5, l.6.21

puruṣākṣiptatāyāṃ ca tathaiva vyabhicāritā | padavaidikavākyānāṃ na satyavyāpitā bhavet || 5,6.21 ||

p.5, l.6.22

sambandhātubhavaś cāyaṃ so 'nyatrāpi vilakṣaṇaḥ | etasmin puruṣāpekṣā deśāpekṣāgnidhūmayoḥ || 5,6.22 ||

p.5, l.6.23

kālādyapekṣayā cānyaḥ, uktā cānyair abhinnatā | āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyād anumānataḥ || 5,6.23 ||

p.5, l.6.24

na cāpūrvādiśabdānāṃ bhedāt sarvatra bhinnatā | na cehāśvādiśabdebhyo bhedas teṣāṃ pratīyate || 5,6.24 ||

p.5, l.6.25

na cāpy ajñātasambandhaṃ padaṃ kiñ cit prakāśakam | sambandhān anubhūtyāto na syād ananumānatā || 5,6.25 ||

p.5, l.6.26

tulyākāratayāpy atra śabdajñānārthataddhiyām | agnidhūmeṣv adṛṣṭatvān na bhedas tannivāraṇāt || 5,6.26 ||

p.5, l.6.27

pratibimbeṣv anaikānto bimbaṃ yādṛgghi darpaṇe | tādṛṅ mukhādi budhyante, na cātrānanumānatā || 5,6.27 ||

p.5, l.6.28

pratyakṣatā tadāpy atra tadānyair vyabhicāritā | yatra pādādi bambena gatānām anumīyate || 5,6.28 ||

p.5, l.6.29

ekavākyāt sakṛc coktān nāpy anekasya tatkṣaṇam | syād viruddhāviruddhasya bodhād etasya bhinnatā || 5,6.29 ||

p.5, l.6.30

liṅgasyāpi hi tādrūpyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuviruddhayoḥ | virodhān nānumānaṃ cet, syād anāgamatāpi te || 5,6.30 ||

p.5, l.6.31

yatra caikārthatā vākye tatra syād anumānatā | sakṛduccarite cāsmin vivakṣaikaiva dṛśyate || 5,6.31 ||

p.5, l.6.32

yas tv anirdhāritārthānām anekapratibhodbhavaḥ | sa liṅge 'py asphuṭe dṛṣṭas tasmān naitena bhidyate || 5,6.32 ||

p.5, l.6.33

dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ ca dhūmādau vyabhicāritam | prasiddhatvād dhi tatrāpi na dṛṣṭānto 'bhidhīyate || 5,6.33 ||

p.5, l.6.34

anabhyas te tv apekṣante śabde sambandhinaḥ smṛtim | atra pratyukta ity evaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kva cit || 5,6.34 ||

p.5, l.6.35

paroktā hetavaś cātra nābhedasya nivāritāḥ | śabdānumānayor aikyaṃ dhūmād agnyanumānavat || 5,6.35 ||

p.5, l.6.36

anvayavyatirekābhyām ekapratyakṣadarśanāt | sambandhapūrvakatvāc ca pratipattir ito yataḥ || 5,6.36 ||

p.5, l.6.37

pratyakṣānyapramāṇatvāt tadadṛṣṭārthabodhanāt | sāmānyaviṣayatvāc ca traikālyaviṣayāśrayāt || 5,6.37 ||

p.5, l.6.38

kaiś cin mīmāṃsakair ukto bhedo 'tra viṣayāntarāt | pūrvābhyāṃ hy aparicchinne śāstram arthe pravartate || 5,6.38 ||

p.5, l.6.39

tatrāpi nāgamatvaṃ syāt puruṣokte, tathās tu cet | pratyayaḥ kin nimitto 'rthe, vaktṛbuddheḥ, kuto nv asau || 5,6.39 ||

p.5, l.6.40

na śabdārthasya sāliṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syāḥ kathañ cana | viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā || 5,6.40 ||

p.5, l.6.41

tena vaktur abhiprāye pratyakṣādyanirūpite | puruṣoktir api śroturāgamatvaṃ prapadyate || 5,6.41 ||

p.5, l.6.42

na cāpy ananumeyatvam āgamārthasya śakyate | liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gner iva kalpyate || 5,6.42 ||

p.5, l.6.43

na cāpy ananumeyatvāt pramāṇāntaragamyatā | rūpasyāśrāvaṇatvena na hy apratyakṣateṣyate || 5,6.43 ||

p.5, l.6.44

evaṃ sati svayūthyā na ke cin nātiprapañcinaḥ | anumānaviśeṣo 'yam īdṛg dharmasya bodhakaḥ || 5,6.44 ||

p.5, l.6.45

bhaviṣyatyartharūpaṃ tu liṅgaṃ dharme nirākṛtam | saṃjñānumānatecchā tu na duṣyedāgame 'pi naḥ || 5,6.45 ||

p.5, l.6.46

lakṣaṇena tv abhinnatvaṃ yadi śabdānumānayoḥ | vedajñānāpramāṇatvaṃ syād atallakṣaṇatvataḥ || 5,6.46 ||

p.5, l.6.47

āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyān nṛvacassu hi | lakṣaṇenānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhimṛcchati || 5,6.47 ||

p.5, l.6.48

vede tv āptanarābhāvāt sambandhānubhavād ṛte | lakṣaṇaṃ nānumānasyety aprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate || 5,6.48 ||

p.5, l.6.49

nanv ekadeśasatyatve tasya syād anumānatā | vedatvād agnihotrādau vāyukṣepiṣṭhavākyavat || 5,6.49 ||

p.5, l.6.50

nādityayūpe 'naikāntāt, tadvad vā gauṇatā bhavet | nātaḥ pratyanumānānām evaṃ pūrvoktayā viśā || 5,6.50 ||

p.5, l.6.51

tasmāl lakṣaṇabhedena yadi śabdapramāṇatā | samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā || 5,6.51 ||

p.5, l.6.52

tena cāptopadeśatvaṃ na syād āgamalakṣaṇam | nāptasya sambhavo vede, loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā || 5,6.52 ||

p.5, l.6.53

purastād varṇitaṃ hy etat, tasmāc chabdena yā matiḥ | tasyāḥ svataḥ pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syād doṣadarśanam || 5,6.53 ||

p.5, l.6.54

anumānena caitasya prāmāṇyaṃ kevalaṃ samam | pade tāvat kṛto yatnaḥ parair ity atra varṇyate || 5,6.54 ||

p.5, l.6.55

viṣayo 'nyādṛśas tāvad dṛśyate liṅgaśabdayoḥ | sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca padasya sthāpayiṣyati || 5,6.55 ||

p.5, l.6.56

dharmādharmaviśiṣṭaś ca liṅgīty etac ca sādhitam | na tāvad anumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat || 5,6.56 ||

p.5, l.6.57

sāmānyād atiriktaṃ tu śābde vākyasya gocaraḥ | sāmarthyād anumeyatvād aśrute 'pi padāntare || 5,6.57 ||

p.5, l.6.58

saṃkhyādimān padārthaś cet, na tāvat so 'vyayādiṣu | yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakter viśeṣaṇam || 5,6.58 ||

p.5, l.6.59

padāntarābhidheyasya tādarthyāc ca kriyātmanaḥ | vākyārthe 'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate || 5,6.59 ||

p.5, l.6.60

saty apy atra viśeṣṭatve siddhatvān naiva pakṣatā | tāvān eva hi tatrārtho yaḥ pūrvam avadhāritaḥ || 5,6.60 ||

p.5, l.6.61

bhedabuddheś ca vaiṣamyaṃ prakṛtipratyayārthayoḥ | viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyārthasvātantryagrahaṇaṃ na ca || 5,6.61 ||

p.5, l.6.62

viśeṣyapūrvikā tatra buddhiś cātra viparyayaḥ | atha śabdo 'rthavattvena pakṣaḥ kasmān na kalpyate || 5,6.62 ||

p.5, l.6.63

pratijñārthaikadeśo hi hetus tatra prasajyate | pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe ca sāmānyaṃ hetur iṣyate || 5,6.63 ||

p.5, l.6.64

śabdatvaṃ gamakaṃ nātra gośabdatvaṃ niṣetsyate | vyaktir eva viśiṣyāto hetuś caikā prasajyate || 5,6.64 ||

p.5, l.6.65

bhaved vyañjakabhedāc cet, na tv evaṃ pratyayo 'sti naḥ | kathaṃ cāsya viśiṣṭatvaṃ na tāvad deśakālataḥ || 5,6.65 ||

p.5, l.6.66

tatpratītiviśiṣṭaś cet, paraṃ kim anumīyate | na pratyāyanaśaktiś ca viśeṣasyānumīyate || 5,6.66 ||

p.5, l.6.67

viśeṣāṇāṃ na śaktir hi saikadeśe 'gnijātivat | sāmānyasyaiva śaktatvaṃ pakṣo hetus tad eva ca || 5,6.67 ||

p.5, l.6.68

tasmād arthaviśiṣṭasya na śabdasyānumeyatā | kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirūpyate || 5,6.68 ||

p.5, l.6.69

na kriyākartṛsambandhād ṛte sambandhanaṃ kva cit | rājā bharttā manuṣyasya tena rājñaḥ sa ucyate || 5,6.69 ||

p.5, l.6.70

vṛkṣas tiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tāḥ | deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati || 5,6.70 ||

p.5, l.6.71

kāryakāraṇabhāvādau kriyā sarvatra vidyate | na cānavagatākāraḥ sambandho 'stīti gamyate || 5,6.71 ||

p.5, l.6.72

na cāsty asati sambandhe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo 'pi vā | tasmān na pakṣadharmo 'yam iti śakyā nirūpaṇā || 5,6.72 ||

p.5, l.6.73

nivṛtte 'nyatra sambandhe ye 'pi tadviṣayātmanā | vadeyuḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyānupalabdhivat || 5,6.73 ||

p.5, l.6.74

tair apy etannirūpyaṃ tu śabdas tadviṣayaḥ katham | na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā || 5,6.74 ||

p.5, l.6.75

tasmād utpādayaty eṣa yato 'rthaviṣayā matim | tena tadviṣayaḥ śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā || 5,6.75 ||

p.5, l.6.76

tatra vācakatāyāṃ ca siddhāyāṃ pakṣadharmatā | na pratītyaṅgatāṃ gacchen na caivam anumānatā || 5,6.76 ||

p.5, l.6.77

gamakatvāc ca dharmatvaṃ dharmatvād gamako yadi | syād anyonyāśrayatvaṃ hi tasmān naiṣāpi kalpanā || 5,6.77 ||

p.5, l.6.78

na cāgṛhītasambandhāḥ svarūpavyatirekataḥ | śabdaṃ jānanti yenātra pakṣadharmamatir bhavet || 5,6.78 ||

p.5, l.6.79

na ca svarūpamātreṇa dhūmādeḥ pakṣadharmatā | na cāpi pūrvasambandham apekṣyaiṣā prasajyate || 5,6.79 ||

p.5, l.6.80

dhūmavān ayam ity evam apūrvasyāpi jāyate | pakṣadharmamatiḥ, tena bhidyetottaralakṣaṇāt || 5,6.80 ||

p.5, l.6.81

na tv atra pūrvasambandhād adhikā pakṣadharmatā | na cārthapratyayāt pūrvam ity anaṅgam iyaṃ bhavet || 5,6.81 ||

p.5, l.6.82

na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet | parvatādir yathā deśaḥ prāgdharmatvāvadhāraṇāt || 5,6.82 ||

p.5, l.6.83

yaś cātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva naḥ | na cānavadhṛte tasmiṃs taddharmatvāvadhāraṇam || 5,6.83 ||

p.5, l.6.84

prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhītaḥ kiṃ tataḥ param | paṣadharmādibhir jñātair yena syād anumānitā || 5,6.84 ||

p.5, l.6.85

anvayo na ca śabdasya prameyeṇa nirūpyate | vyāpāreṇa hi sarveṣām anvitatvaṃ pratīyate || 5,6.85 ||

p.5, l.6.86

yatra dhūmo 'sti tatrāgner astitvenānvayaḥ sphuṭaḥ | na tv evaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścayaḥ || 5,6.86 ||

p.5, l.6.87

na tāvat tatra deśe 'sau tatkāle vāvagamyate | bhaven nityavibhutvāc cet, sarvārtheṣu ca tat samam || 5,6.87 ||

p.5, l.6.88

tena sarvatra dṛṣṭatvād vyatirekasya cāgateḥ | sarvaśabdair aśeṣārthapratipattiḥ prasajyate || 5,6.88 ||

p.5, l.6.89

athaivaṃ deśakālābhyām asatyatvaprakalpane | vācakapratyayaṃ kaś cid brūyād arthadhiyānvitam || 5,6.89 ||

p.5, l.6.90

naivam apy asti dṛṣṭo hi vināpy arthadhiyā kva cit | vācakapratyayo 'smābhir avyutpannanarān prati || 5,6.90 ||

p.5, l.6.91

dvitīyādiprayoge ca bhaved anvayakalpanā | śatakṛtvaḥ prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhīḥ kva cit || 5,6.91 ||

p.5, l.6.92

nanu ye jñātasambandhās teṣāṃ dṛṣṭo 'nvayaḥ sphuṭaḥ | yady evam anvayāt pūrvaṃ sambandhaḥ ko 'pi kalpitaḥ || 5,6.92 ||

p.5, l.6.93

nāṅgam arthadhiyām eṣā bhaved anvayakalpanā | anvayādhīnajanmatvam anumānasya ca sthitam || 5,6.93 ||

p.5, l.6.94

jñāte pratītisāmarthye tadvaśād eva jāyate | paścād anvaya ity eṣa kāraṇaṃ katham ucyate || 5,6.94 ||

p.5, l.6.95

tasmāt tannirapekṣaiva śabdaśaktiḥ pratīyate | na ca dhūmānvayāt pūrvaṃ śaktatvam avagamyate || 5,6.95 ||

p.5, l.6.96

vyatireko 'py avijñātād arthāc chabdadhiyau yadi | so 'pi paścāt sthitatvena nārthapratyayasādhanam || 5,6.96 ||

p.5, l.6.97

sambandhaṃ yaṃ tu vakṣyāmastasya nirṇayakāraṇam | syād anvayo 'tirekaś ca na tv arthādhigamasya tau || 5,6.97 ||

p.5, l.6.98

tasmād ananumānatvaṃ cābde pratyakṣavad bhavet | trairūpyarahitatvena tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt || 5,6.98 ||

p.5, l.6.99

sati cāsya pramāṇatve bhedābhedanirūpanā | yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramīyate || 5,6.99 ||

p.5, l.6.100

padaṃ prayujyamānaṃ hi caturddhārthe prayujyate | pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā || 5,6.100 ||

p.5, l.6.101

tatra yat pūrvavijñāte pratyakṣe ca prayujyate | pramite ca prayuktatvād anuvādo 'dhikād vinā || 5,6.101 ||

p.5, l.6.102

adṛṣṭapūrve tv ajñānaṃ sambandhapratyayo 'pi vā | sambandho na ca tasyārthaḥ, yo 'rthaḥ sa tv anyagocaraḥ || 5,6.102 ||

p.5, l.6.103

parokṣe 'nanubhūte ca nābhidheye matir bhavet | parokṣaś cānubhūtaś ca yas tatra smṛtir iṣyate || 5,6.103 ||

p.5, l.6.104

pramite ca pravṛttatvāt smṛter nāsti pramāṇatā | paricchedaphalatvād dhi prāmāṇyam upajāyate || 5,6.104 ||

p.5, l.6.105

tādātvikaparicchedaphalatvena pramāṇatā | pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛter api na kalpyate || 5,6.105 ||

p.5, l.6.106

yāvān pūrvaparicchinnas tāvān evāvadhāryate | smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadāsattve 'sya naiva dhīḥ || 5,6.106 ||

p.5, l.6.107

padam abhyadhikābhāvāt smārakān na viśiṣyate | padādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñ cit tatpadasya na gocaraḥ || 5,6.107 ||

p.5, l.6.108

pramāṇam anumānaṃ vā yady api syāt padānmitiḥ | vākyārthasyāgamārthatvād doṣo nāgamavādinām || 5,6.108 ||

p.5, l.6.109

vākyārthe tu padārthebhyaḥ sambandhānubhavād ṛte | buddhir utpadyate tena bhinnā 'sāvakṣabuddhivat || 5,6.109 ||

p.5, l.6.110

vākyādhikaraṇe cāsya hetoḥ siddhir bhaviṣyati | sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyabuddhāvasiddhatā || 5,6.110 ||

p.5, l.6.111

vākyeṣv adṛṣṭeṣv api sārthakeṣu padārthavinmātratayā pratītim | dṛṣṭvānumānavyatirekabhītāḥ kliṣṭāḥ padābhedavicāraṇāyām || 5,6.111 ||

§ 5,7 upamānapariccheda UMP

p.5, l.7.1

    • kīdṛggavaya ityevaṃ pṛṣṭo nāgarikair yadi |
    • bravītyāraṇyako vākyaṃ yathā gaur gavayas tathā || 5,7.1 ||
    • (p.308)etasminn upamānatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śabare punaḥ |
    • tasyāgamābahirbhāvād anyathaivopavarṇitam || 5,7.2 ||
    • puruṣapratyayenaiva tatrārthaḥ sampratīyate |
    • tadīyavacanatvena tasmād āgama eva saḥ || 5,7.3 ||
    • sadṛśād upajāyeta yā matiḥ sadṛśāntare |
    • dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet || 5,7.4 ||
    • deśakālādibhedena yathānyatra viśiṣyate |
    • prameyaṃ naivam asty atra nagarasthānusārataḥ || 5,7.5 ||
    • śrutātideśavākyānām āraṇye gavaye matiḥ |
    • yā sopamānaṃ keṣāñ cid gosādṛśyānurañjitā || 5,7.6 ||
    • pratyakṣo gavayas tāvat sādṛśyasmṛtir atra tu |
    • nanu sādṛśyayukte 'rthe na smṛtir nendriyād gatiḥ || 5,7.7 ||
    • (p.309)pūrvavākyārthavijñānān nādhikyaṃ gavaye yadi |
    • smaraṇād aviśiṣṭatvāt saṅgater na pramāṇatā || 5,7.8 ||
    • atha tv adhikatā kā cit pratyakṣādivaśād bhavet |
    • yāvaddhīndriyasambandhas tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam || 5,7.9 ||
    • syaryamāṇasya cāṃśasya vivedenāpramāṇatā |
    • śrutātideśavākyatvaṃ na cātīvopayujyate || 5,7.10 ||
    • ye 'pi hy aśrutatadvākyās teṣām api bhavaty ayam |
    • pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānāṃ vane gavayadarśinām || 5,7.11 ||
    • atha saṃjñānusandhānaṃ teṣāṃ nāstīti varṇyate |
    • na nāma vastu tat tāvat sarvathā taiḥ pratīyate || 5,7.12 ||
    • na ca śabdārthasambandhaḥ prameyo 'tra tadeṣyate |
    • (p.310)sādṛśyāvadhṛte vākye vākyād avagato hy asau || 5,7.13 ||
    • na cāsya pratyabhijñānaṃ punarutpadyate vane |
    • śaktyor atīndriyatvena smṛtir eva hi seṣyate || 5,7.14 ||
    • śabdānuviddhabodhe 'pi pratyakṣam upapāditam |
    • tasmāt sādṛśyayuktārthaḥ prameyo 'pūrva ucyatām || 5,7.15 ||
    • vyavasāyātmakatvaṃ tu pratyakṣasya yadeṣyate |
    • jātyādivat tadā tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate || 5,7.16 ||
    • pratyakṣābhāsam etat tu nirvikalpakavādinām |
    • (p.311)prameyavastvabhāvāc ca nābhipretā pramāṇatā || 5,7.17 ||
    • sādṛśyasyāpi vastutvaṃ na śakyam apabādhitum |
    • bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogo jātyantarasya tat || 5,7.18 ||
    • (p.312)sadṛśāvayavatvaṃ tu yatra padmadalākṣivat |
    • tat svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā teṣā bhaviṣyati || 5,7.19 ||
    • evaṃ jātiguṇadravyakriyāśaktisvadharmataḥ |
    • ekaikadvitrisāmastyabhedād etasya citratā || 5,7.20 ||
    • na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā |
    • bhūyastvavaddhi jātyādi sadṛśatvena dṛśyate || 5,7.21 ||
    • yamayoḥ katham etac ced, dṛṣṭatvāt kim ihocyate |
    • kva cid dhi bhūyasām etat kva cid alpīyasām api || 5,7.22 ||
    • naitāvatā viśeṣeṇa vastutvaṃ tasya hīyate |
    • (p.313)sāmānyāny api caitāni nāśīnyāśrayanāśataḥ || 5,7.23 ||
    • anantāśrayayogāc ca na nāśo 'nyatra vidyate |
    • tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate || 5,7.24 ||
    • sāmānyānāṃ na vā nāśaḥ kva cid abhyupagamyate |
    • sarvasya hy āśrayaḥ kaś cid asti deśāntarādiṣu || 5,7.25 ||
    • teṣāṃ bhūyas tayā cedaṃ sādṛśyam atiricyate |
    • tāni vyastāni santy evaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kva cit kva cit || 5,7.26 ||
    • sadṛśāvayavatvaṃ tu yatra nāma pratīyate |
    • tad apy avayavānāṃ syāt samānavayavāntaraiḥ || 5,7.27 ||
    • evaṃ tāvad yato nāsti parābhedaprakalpanā |
    • tataḥ paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam || 5,7.28 ||
    • pradhānānāṃ tu sāmānyaṃ yatraikaṃ sampratīyate |
    • sa eveti bhavet tatra tadbhede sadṛśatvadhīḥ || 5,7.29 ||
    • (p.314)citrādau yatra sādṛśyaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet |
    • tatrāpi pṛthivīvarṇaviśeṣādisamānatā || 5,7.30 ||
    • rūpagandharasānāṃ ca kasya cit tulyatā kva cit |
    • nāvaśyaṃ sarvasāmānyāt sādṛśyam upajāyate || 5,7.31 ||
    • pṛthivyādiṣu caiteṣāṃ satām eva svabhāvataḥ |
    • pariṇāmādibhir vyaktir yathādṛṣṭyavadhāryate || 5,7.32 ||
    • na hi śaktyātmanā kiñ cid asajjanma prapadyate |
    • (p.315)dharmāṇāṃ na ca nānātvam, asti cāvāntarasthitiḥ || 5,7.33 ||
    • vastutve sati cāsyaivaṃ sambandhasya ca cakṣuṣā |
    • dvayor ekatra vā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na vāryate || 5,7.34 ||
    • sāmānyavac ca sādṛśyam ekaikatra samāpyate |
    • pratiyoginyadṛṣṭe 'pi tasmāt tadupapadyate || 5,7.35 ||
    • tatra yady api gāṃ smṛtvā tadbhānam upajāyate |
    • sannidhergavayasthatvād bhaved indriyagocaraḥ || 5,7.36 ||
    • tasmād yat smaryate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitam |
    • prameyam upamānasya sādṛśyaṃ vā tadanvatam || 5,7.37 ||
    • (p.316)pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe 'pi sādṛśye gavi ca smṛteḥ |
    • viśiṣṭasyānyato 'siddher upamānapramāṇatā || 5,7.38 ||
    • pratyakṣe 'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake |
    • viśiṣṭaviṣayatvena nānumānāpramāṇatā || 5,7.39 ||
    • yatra tv asadṛśād eva kalpayitvopajāyate |
    • sādṛśyapratyayas tatra tadābhāsatvakalpanā || 5,7.40 ||
    • bādhakapratyayāc caiṣā sādṛśyābhāsatā matā |
    • yathā palālakūṭasya sādṛśyaṃ kuñjarādinā || 5,7.41 ||
    • (p.317)samīpastho 'pi jānāti sādṛśyaṃ neti tatra hi |
    • na bādhyate samīpādau yat tu sādṛśyam eva tat || 5,7.42 ||
    • na caitasyānumānatvaṃ pakṣadharmādyasambhavāt |
    • prāk prameyasya sādṛśyaṃ na dharmatvena gṛhyate || 5,7.43 ||
    • gavaye gṛhyamāṇaṃ ca na gavām anumāpakam |
    • pratijñārthaikadeśatvād gogatasya na liṅgatā || 5,7.44 ||
    • gavayaś cāpy asambandhān na gor liṅgatvamṛcchati |
    • sādṛśyaṃ na ca sarveṇa pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadanvayi || 5,7.45 ||
    • ekasminn api dṛṣṭe 'rthe dvitīyaṃ paśyato vane |
    • sādṛśyena sahaivāsmiṃs tadaivotpadyate matiḥ || 5,7.46 ||
    • (p.318)śṛṅgitvāder athocyeta sambandhāl liṅgatā gavi |
    • na, teṣāṃ gavayajñānavyāpāraṃ pratyupakṣayāt || 5,7.47 ||
    • yadi tebhyaḥ pratītiḥ syān niḥsādṛśyaiva sā bhavet |
    • na gauḥ śṛṅgādisadṛśī sadṛśī gavayena tu || 5,7.48 ||
    • sadṛśapratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śṛṅgādipratyayāt param |
    • gavayapratyayād eva gojñānam upajāyate || 5,7.49 ||
    • sadṛśāvayavatve tu teṣām evopamā bhavet |
    • na ca śṛṅgādayo yatra tatra gaur anumīyate || 5,7.50 ||
    • itthaṃ cānumimānasya bhrāntajñānaṃ prasajyate |
    • nagarasthe tu gojñānaṃ smaraṇān nātivartate || 5,7.51 ||
    • (p.319)bhinnānumānād upameyam uktam, sauryādivākyair asahāyi dṛṣṭam |
    • sādṛśyato 'gnyādiyutaṃ kathaṃ nu, pratyāyayed ity upayujyate naḥ || 5,7.52 ||
    • pratinidhir api caivaṃ vrīhisādṛśyayogād bhavati tadapacāre yatra nīvārajātau |
    • tad api phalam abhīṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇasyopamāyāḥ pratikṛtir api gauṇair bodhyate yatra cānyaiḥ || 5,7.53 ||
    • yadi susadṛśamanyal labhyate tatra mithyā bhavati visadṛśatvān mandasādṛśyayuktam |
    • matir api ca tathaiva drāgivotpadyate 'sminn itaraviṣayabodhe 'saty apītthaṃ ca bādhaḥ || 5,7.54 ||
kīdṛggavaya ityevaṃ pṛṣṭo nāgarikair yadi | bravītyāraṇyako vākyaṃ yathā gaur gavayas tathā || 5,7.1 ||

p.5, l.7.2

etasminn upamānatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śabare punaḥ | tasyāgamābahirbhāvād anyathaivopavarṇitam || 5,7.2 ||

p.5, l.7.3

puruṣapratyayenaiva tatrārthaḥ sampratīyate | tadīyavacanatvena tasmād āgama eva saḥ || 5,7.3 ||

p.5, l.7.4

sadṛśād upajāyeta yā matiḥ sadṛśāntare | dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet || 5,7.4 ||

p.5, l.7.5

deśakālādibhedena yathānyatra viśiṣyate | prameyaṃ naivam asty atra nagarasthānusārataḥ || 5,7.5 ||

p.5, l.7.6

śrutātideśavākyānām āraṇye gavaye matiḥ | yā sopamānaṃ keṣāñ cid gosādṛśyānurañjitā || 5,7.6 ||

p.5, l.7.7

pratyakṣo gavayas tāvat sādṛśyasmṛtir atra tu | nanu sādṛśyayukte 'rthe na smṛtir nendriyād gatiḥ || 5,7.7 ||

p.5, l.7.8

pūrvavākyārthavijñānān nādhikyaṃ gavaye yadi | smaraṇād aviśiṣṭatvāt saṅgater na pramāṇatā || 5,7.8 ||

p.5, l.7.9

atha tv adhikatā kā cit pratyakṣādivaśād bhavet | yāvaddhīndriyasambandhas tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam || 5,7.9 ||

p.5, l.7.10

syaryamāṇasya cāṃśasya vivedenāpramāṇatā | śrutātideśavākyatvaṃ na cātīvopayujyate || 5,7.10 ||

p.5, l.7.11

ye 'pi hy aśrutatadvākyās teṣām api bhavaty ayam | pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānāṃ vane gavayadarśinām || 5,7.11 ||

p.5, l.7.12

atha saṃjñānusandhānaṃ teṣāṃ nāstīti varṇyate | na nāma vastu tat tāvat sarvathā taiḥ pratīyate || 5,7.12 ||

p.5, l.7.13

na ca śabdārthasambandhaḥ prameyo 'tra tadeṣyate | sādṛśyāvadhṛte vākye vākyād avagato hy asau || 5,7.13 ||

p.5, l.7.14

na cāsya pratyabhijñānaṃ punarutpadyate vane | śaktyor atīndriyatvena smṛtir eva hi seṣyate || 5,7.14 ||

p.5, l.7.15

śabdānuviddhabodhe 'pi pratyakṣam upapāditam | tasmāt sādṛśyayuktārthaḥ prameyo 'pūrva ucyatām || 5,7.15 ||

p.5, l.7.16

vyavasāyātmakatvaṃ tu pratyakṣasya yadeṣyate | jātyādivat tadā tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate || 5,7.16 ||

p.5, l.7.17

pratyakṣābhāsam etat tu nirvikalpakavādinām | prameyavastvabhāvāc ca nābhipretā pramāṇatā || 5,7.17 ||

p.5, l.7.18

sādṛśyasyāpi vastutvaṃ na śakyam apabādhitum | bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogo jātyantarasya tat || 5,7.18 ||

p.5, l.7.19

sadṛśāvayavatvaṃ tu yatra padmadalākṣivat | tat svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā teṣā bhaviṣyati || 5,7.19 ||

p.5, l.7.20

evaṃ jātiguṇadravyakriyāśaktisvadharmataḥ | ekaikadvitrisāmastyabhedād etasya citratā || 5,7.20 ||

p.5, l.7.21

na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā | bhūyastvavaddhi jātyādi sadṛśatvena dṛśyate || 5,7.21 ||

p.5, l.7.22

yamayoḥ katham etac ced, dṛṣṭatvāt kim ihocyate | kva cid dhi bhūyasām etat kva cid alpīyasām api || 5,7.22 ||

p.5, l.7.23

naitāvatā viśeṣeṇa vastutvaṃ tasya hīyate | sāmānyāny api caitāni nāśīnyāśrayanāśataḥ || 5,7.23 ||

p.5, l.7.24

anantāśrayayogāc ca na nāśo 'nyatra vidyate | tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate || 5,7.24 ||

p.5, l.7.25

sāmānyānāṃ na vā nāśaḥ kva cid abhyupagamyate | sarvasya hy āśrayaḥ kaś cid asti deśāntarādiṣu || 5,7.25 ||

p.5, l.7.26

teṣāṃ bhūyas tayā cedaṃ sādṛśyam atiricyate | tāni vyastāni santy evaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kva cit kva cit || 5,7.26 ||

p.5, l.7.27

sadṛśāvayavatvaṃ tu yatra nāma pratīyate | tad apy avayavānāṃ syāt samānavayavāntaraiḥ || 5,7.27 ||

p.5, l.7.28

evaṃ tāvad yato nāsti parābhedaprakalpanā | tataḥ paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam || 5,7.28 ||

p.5, l.7.29

pradhānānāṃ tu sāmānyaṃ yatraikaṃ sampratīyate | sa eveti bhavet tatra tadbhede sadṛśatvadhīḥ || 5,7.29 ||

p.5, l.7.30

citrādau yatra sādṛśyaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet | tatrāpi pṛthivīvarṇaviśeṣādisamānatā || 5,7.30 ||

p.5, l.7.31

rūpagandharasānāṃ ca kasya cit tulyatā kva cit | nāvaśyaṃ sarvasāmānyāt sādṛśyam upajāyate || 5,7.31 ||

p.5, l.7.32

pṛthivyādiṣu caiteṣāṃ satām eva svabhāvataḥ | pariṇāmādibhir vyaktir yathādṛṣṭyavadhāryate || 5,7.32 ||

p.5, l.7.33

na hi śaktyātmanā kiñ cid asajjanma prapadyate | dharmāṇāṃ na ca nānātvam, asti cāvāntarasthitiḥ || 5,7.33 ||

p.5, l.7.34

vastutve sati cāsyaivaṃ sambandhasya ca cakṣuṣā | dvayor ekatra vā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na vāryate || 5,7.34 ||

p.5, l.7.35

sāmānyavac ca sādṛśyam ekaikatra samāpyate | pratiyoginyadṛṣṭe 'pi tasmāt tadupapadyate || 5,7.35 ||

p.5, l.7.36

tatra yady api gāṃ smṛtvā tadbhānam upajāyate | sannidhergavayasthatvād bhaved indriyagocaraḥ || 5,7.36 ||

p.5, l.7.37

tasmād yat smaryate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitam | prameyam upamānasya sādṛśyaṃ vā tadanvatam || 5,7.37 ||

p.5, l.7.38

pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe 'pi sādṛśye gavi ca smṛteḥ | viśiṣṭasyānyato 'siddher upamānapramāṇatā || 5,7.38 ||

p.5, l.7.39

pratyakṣe 'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake | viśiṣṭaviṣayatvena nānumānāpramāṇatā || 5,7.39 ||

p.5, l.7.40

yatra tv asadṛśād eva kalpayitvopajāyate | sādṛśyapratyayas tatra tadābhāsatvakalpanā || 5,7.40 ||

p.5, l.7.41

bādhakapratyayāc caiṣā sādṛśyābhāsatā matā | yathā palālakūṭasya sādṛśyaṃ kuñjarādinā || 5,7.41 ||

p.5, l.7.42

samīpastho 'pi jānāti sādṛśyaṃ neti tatra hi | na bādhyate samīpādau yat tu sādṛśyam eva tat || 5,7.42 ||

p.5, l.7.43

na caitasyānumānatvaṃ pakṣadharmādyasambhavāt | prāk prameyasya sādṛśyaṃ na dharmatvena gṛhyate || 5,7.43 ||

p.5, l.7.44

gavaye gṛhyamāṇaṃ ca na gavām anumāpakam | pratijñārthaikadeśatvād gogatasya na liṅgatā || 5,7.44 ||

p.5, l.7.45

gavayaś cāpy asambandhān na gor liṅgatvamṛcchati | sādṛśyaṃ na ca sarveṇa pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadanvayi || 5,7.45 ||

p.5, l.7.46

ekasminn api dṛṣṭe 'rthe dvitīyaṃ paśyato vane | sādṛśyena sahaivāsmiṃs tadaivotpadyate matiḥ || 5,7.46 ||

p.5, l.7.47

śṛṅgitvāder athocyeta sambandhāl liṅgatā gavi | na, teṣāṃ gavayajñānavyāpāraṃ pratyupakṣayāt || 5,7.47 ||

p.5, l.7.48

yadi tebhyaḥ pratītiḥ syān niḥsādṛśyaiva sā bhavet | na gauḥ śṛṅgādisadṛśī sadṛśī gavayena tu || 5,7.48 ||

p.5, l.7.49

sadṛśapratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śṛṅgādipratyayāt param | gavayapratyayād eva gojñānam upajāyate || 5,7.49 ||

p.5, l.7.50

sadṛśāvayavatve tu teṣām evopamā bhavet | na ca śṛṅgādayo yatra tatra gaur anumīyate || 5,7.50 ||

p.5, l.7.51

itthaṃ cānumimānasya bhrāntajñānaṃ prasajyate | nagarasthe tu gojñānaṃ smaraṇān nātivartate || 5,7.51 ||

p.5, l.7.52

bhinnānumānād upameyam uktam, sauryādivākyair asahāyi dṛṣṭam | sādṛśyato 'gnyādiyutaṃ kathaṃ nu, pratyāyayed ity upayujyate naḥ || 5,7.52 ||

p.5, l.7.53

pratinidhir api caivaṃ vrīhisādṛśyayogād bhavati tadapacāre yatra nīvārajātau | tad api phalam abhīṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇasyopamāyāḥ pratikṛtir api gauṇair bodhyate yatra cānyaiḥ || 5,7.53 ||

p.5, l.7.54

yadi susadṛśamanyal labhyate tatra mithyā bhavati visadṛśatvān mandasādṛśyayuktam | matir api ca tathaiva drāgivotpadyate 'sminn itaraviṣayabodhe 'saty apītthaṃ ca bādhaḥ || 5,7.54 ||

§ 5,8 arthāpattipariccheda AAP

p.5, l.8.1

    • (p.320)pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto yatrārtho nānyathā bhavet |
    • adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayed anyaṃ sārthāpattir udāhṛtā || 5,8.1 ||
    • dṛṣṭaḥ pañcabhir apy asmād bhedenoktā śrutodbhavā |
    • pramāṇagrāhiṇītvena yasmāt pūrvavilakṣaṇā || 5,8.2 ||
    • tatra pratyakṣato jñānād dāhād dahanaśaktatā |
    • vahner anumitāt sūrye yānāt tacchaktiyogyatā || 5,8.3 ||
    • śrutārthāpattir atraiva parastād abhidhāsyate |
    • gavayopamitā yā gaus tajjñānagrāhyatā matā || 5,8.4 ||
    • abhidhānaprasiddhyartham arthāpattyāvabodhitāt |
    • śabde bodhakasāmarthyāt tannityatvaprakalpanam || 5,8.5 ||
    • (p.321)abhidhā nānyathā sidhyed iti vācakaśaktatām |
    • arthāpattyāvagamyaivaṃ tadananyagateḥ punaḥ || 5,8.6 ||
    • arthāpattyantareṇaiva śabdanityatvaniścayaḥ |
    • darśanasya parārthatvād ity asminn abhidhāsyate || 5,8.7 ||
    • pramāṇābhāvanirṇītacaitrābhāvaviśeṣitāt |
    • gehāc caitrabahirbhāvasiddhir yā tv iha darśitā || 5,8.8 ||
    • tām abhāvotthitām anyām arthāpattim udāharet |
    • pakṣadoṣeṣu cānyāsāmudāharaṇavistaraḥ || 5,8.9 ||
    • abhāvāvagatāc caitrād bahirbhāvasya sūcanam |
    • pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvād bhinnaivāpy anumānataḥ || 5,8.10 ||
    • bahirdeśaviśiṣṭe 'rthe deśe vā tadviśeṣite |
    • prameye yo gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmas tv asau katham || 5,8.11 ||
    • tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ tu gṛhaṃ dharmo na kasyacit |
    • gṛhābhāvaviśiṣṭas tu tadāsau na pratīyate || 5,8.12 ||
    • gamyate tu gṛhaṃ tatra na ca caitraḥ pratīyate |
    • (p.322)na cātrādarśanaṃ hetur yathābhāve 'bhidhāsyate || 5,8.13 ||
    • tena veśmanyadṛṣṭatvād iti hetur na kalpyate |
    • adarśanād abhāve ca prameyasyāvadhārite || 5,8.14 ||
    • bahirbhāvamatir nāsau tenādarśanahetukā |
    • caitrābhāvasya hetutvaṃ gehe 'bhāvaś ca saṃsthitaḥ || 5,8.15 ||
    • pūrvaṃ na cāgṛhītasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameyatā |
    • na cātra bāhyadeśo vā caitro vā gṛhyate purā || 5,8.16 ||
    • nadīpūreṇa yā vṛṣṭir upariṣṭāt pratīyate |
    • deśe katham adṛṣṭe tu pakṣadharmatvasambhavaḥ || 5,8.17 ||
    • vṛṣṭimatparadeśatvaṃ nadīpuravato 'tra tu |
    • deśasya pratipadyante yadvārthāpattir eva sā || 5,8.18 ||
    • (p.323)jīvataś ca gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmo 'tra kalpyate |
    • tatsaṃvittir bahirbhāvaṃ na cābuddhvopajāyate || 5,8.19 ||
    • agnimattānapekṣā tu dhūmavattā pratīyate |
    • na tadgrahaṇavelāyām agnyadhīnaṃ hi kiñcana || 5,8.20 ||
    • gehābhāvas tu yaḥ śuddho vidyamānatvavarjitaḥ |
    • sa mṛteṣv api dṛṣṭatvād bahirvṛtter na sādhakaḥ || 5,8.21 ||
    • vidyamānatvasaṃsṛṣṭagṛhābhāvadhiyānayā |
    • gehād utkālitaś caitro vidyate bahir eva hi || 5,8.22 ||
    • gehābhāvatvamātraṃ tu yat svatantraṃ pratīyate |
    • na tāvatā bahirbhāvaś caitrasyaivāvadhāryate || 5,8.23 ||
    • (p.324)siddhe sadbhāvavijñāne gehābhāvadhiyātra tu |
    • gehād utkālitā sattā bahir evāvatiṣṭhate || 5,8.24 ||
    • tenāsya nirapekṣasya vyabhicāro mṛtādinā |
    • yasya tv avyabhicāritvaṃ na tato 'nyat pratīyate || 5,8.25 ||
    • tasmāt pratyakṣato gehe caitrābhāve hy abhāvataḥ |
    • jñāte yat sattvavijñānaṃ tad evedaṃ bahiḥ sthitam || 5,8.26 ||
    • pakṣadharmātmalābhāya bahirbhāvaḥ praveśitaḥ |
    • tadviśiṣṭo 'numeyaḥ syāt pakṣadharmānvayādibhiḥ || 5,8.27 ||
    • pakṣadharmādivijñānaṃ bahiḥ sambodhato yadi |
    • taiś ca tadbodhato 'vaśyam anyonyāśrayatā bhavet || 5,8.28 ||
    • anyathānupapattau tu prameyānupraveśitā |
    • tādrūpyeṇaiva vijñānān na doṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ || 5,8.29 ||
    • (p.325)avinābhāvitā cātra tadaiva parikalpyate |
    • na prāg avadhṛtety evaṃ saty apy eṣā na kāraṇam || 5,8.30 ||
    • gṛhābhāvabahirbhāvau na ca dṛṣṭau niyogataḥ |
    • sāhitye 'pi pramāṇaṃ ca tayor anyan na vidyate || 5,8.31 ||
    • anyathānupapattyaiva hy ekenānyat pratīyate |
    • tathā na kalpyate tac cet sāhityaṃ na pratīyate || 5,8.32 ||
    • tena sambandhavelāyāṃ sambandhyanyataro dhruvam |
    • arthāpattyāvagantavyaḥ paścād asty anumānatā || 5,8.33 ||
    • gṛhadvāri sthito yas tu bahirbhāvaṃ prakalpayet |
    • yadaikasminn ayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate || 5,8.34 ||
    • tadāpy avidyamānatvaṃ na sarvatra pratīyate |
    • na caikadeśe nāstitvād vyāptir hetor bhaviṣyati || 5,8.35 ||
    • (p.326)nanv atrāvidyamānatvaṃ gamyate 'nupalabdhitaḥ |
    • sā cāprayatnasādhyatvād ekasthasyaiva sidhyati || 5,8.36 ||
    • naitayānupalabdhyātra vastvabhāvaḥ pratīyate |
    • taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣv asti satsv api || 5,8.37 ||
    • gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yady artho nopalabhyate |
    • tato 'nyakāraṇābhāvād asann ity avagamyate || 5,8.38 ||
    • nanu cāgnyādyabhāve 'pi dhūmādivyatirekiṇām |
    • taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati || 5,8.39 ||
    • yasya vastvantarābhāvaḥ prameyas tasya duṣyati |
    • mama tv adṛṣṭamātreṇa gamakaḥ sahacāriṇaḥ || 5,8.40 ||
    • nanv evam itaratrāpi sambandho 'nupalabdhitaḥ |
    • caitrābhāvasya bhāvena dṛṣṭatvād upapadyate || 5,8.41 ||
    • (p.327)sāhitye mitadeśatvāt prasiddhe cāgnidhūmayoḥ |
    • vyatirekasya cādṛṣṭer gamakatvaṃ prakalpyate || 5,8.42 ||
    • iha sāhityam evedam ekasya sahabhāvinaḥ |
    • anantadeśavarttitvān na tāvad upapadyate || 5,8.43 ||
    • nanu deśāntaraṃ śūnyaṃ caitreṇaivaṃ pratīyate |
    • taddeśavyatiriktatvāt samīpasthitadeśavat || 5,8.44 ||
    • viruddhāvyabhicāritvaṃ tadvad eva hi gamyate |
    • samīpadeśabhinnatvāt caitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavat || 5,8.45 ||
    • puruṣasya tu kārtsnyena yad ekatropalambhanam |
    • tasyānyathā na siddhiḥ syād ity anyeṣv asya nāstitā || 5,8.46 ||
    • (p.328)tenārthāpattipūrvatvam atra yatra ca kāraṇe |
    • kāryādarśanataḥ śakter astitvaṃ sampratīyate || 5,8.47 ||
    • kāryasya nanu liṅgatvaṃ na sambandhānapekṣaṇāt |
    • dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktir gamyeta nānyathā || 5,8.48 ||
    • taddarśane tadānīṃ ca pratyakṣāder asambhavāt |
    • arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet || 5,8.49 ||
    • (p.329)anumānād abhinnatvān noktau jayaparājayau |
    • vadhyaghātakabhāvena yau sarpanakulādiṣu || 5,8.50 ||
    • pīno divā na bhuṅkte cety evamādivacaḥ śrutau |
    • rātribhojanavijñānaṃ śrutārthāpattir ucyate || 5,8.51 ||
    • tām arthagocarāṃ kecid apare śabdagocarām |
    • kalpayanty āgamāc cainām abhinnāṃ pratijānate || 5,8.52 ||
    • prāyaśaś cānayā vede vyavahāro vyavasthitaḥ |
    • so 'vaidikaḥ prasajyeta yady eṣā bhidyate tataḥ || 5,8.53 ||
    • vacanasya śrutasyaiva so 'py arthaḥ kaiścid āśritaḥ |
    • tadarthopaplutasyānyair iṣṭo vākyāntarasya tu || 5,8.54 ||
    • na tāvac chrūyamāṇasya vacaso 'rtho 'yam iṣyate |
    • na hy anekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā || 5,8.55 ||
    • padārthānvayarūpeṇa vākyārtho hi pratīyate |
    • na rātryādipadārthaś ca divāvākyena gamyate || 5,8.56 ||
    • (p.330)na divādipadārthānāṃ saṃsargo rātribhojanam |
    • na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam || 5,8.57 ||
    • anyārthavyāpṛtatvāc ca na dvitīyārthakalpanā |
    • tasmād vākyāntareṇāyaṃ buddhisthena pratīyate || 5,8.58 ||
    • tasya cāgamikatve 'pi yat tad vākyaṃ pratīyate |
    • pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet || 5,8.59 ||
    • na hy anuccārite vākye pratyakṣaṃ tāvad iṣyate |
    • nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit || 5,8.60 ||
    • yadi tv anupalabdhe 'pi sambandhe liṅgateṣyate |
    • taduccāraṇamātreṇa sarvavākyamatir bhavet || 5,8.61 ||
    • na cārthāpattigamyāni sarvaiḥ sarvavacāṃsi hi |
    • sambaddhāny upalabdhāni yena teṣv anumā bhavet || 5,8.62 ||
    • na ca sattānumānena viśeṣo vānumīyate |
    • (p.331)iha vākyaviśeṣasya sattaiva tv avagamyate || 5,8.63 ||
    • pūrvasiddhaḥ svatantro 'rthaḥ svatantreṇa viśeṣitaḥ |
    • dharmādharmaviśiṣṭo 'tra nānumeyaḥ pratīyate || 5,8.64 ||
    • atha śrutasya vākyasya mīyate tadviśiṣṭatā |
    • tataḥ pakṣo 'bhyupetaḥ syād aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ || 5,8.65 ||
    • kiñ ca liṅgāntarābhāvād etasya yadi liṅgatā |
    • pratijñārthaikadeśatvaṃ padavat te prasajyate || 5,8.66 ||
    • tadvad eva nirākāryā vacaso dharmadharmitā |
    • nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā || 5,8.67 ||
    • kriyākārakasambandhād ṛte nāsti tu dharmatā |
    • avācakatayā caitan na dharmo viṣayātmanā || 5,8.68 ||
    • pratīter vācakatvaṃ cet prasaktānekaśaktitā |
    • anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet || 5,8.69 ||
    • padārthair api tadvākyaṃ nāsambandhāt pratīyate |
    • (p.332)sāmānyānyanyathāsiddher viśeṣaṃ gamayanti hi || 5,8.70 ||
    • na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcin na sidhyati |
    • na cāpy anyaḥ prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau || 5,8.71 ||
    • athaitad vāci kalpyeta vākyam anyat tathaiva ca |
    • prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate || 5,8.72 ||
    • tataś ca prathamād eva varaṃ jñātum asaṅgatāt |
    • anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā || 5,8.73 ||
    • śrutavākyena sādṛśyaṃ nāśrutasyāsti kiñcana |
    • tasmād anupamānatvam arthasyāpy anayā diśā || 5,8.74 ||
    • upamānatvaliṅgatve vākyaṃ prati nivārite |
    • arthe 'pi caivam eva syāt, (p.333)tasmāt pūrveṣv asambhavaḥ || 5,8.75 ||
    • ataḥ śrutasya vākyasya yad arthapratipādanam |
    • tadātmalābha eva syād vinā nety etad iṣyate || 5,8.76 ||
    • etadarthād vinā nāyam ity arthaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate |
    • vākyārthavac ca kiṃ nāyam āgamārthaḥ pratīyate || 5,8.77 ||
    • savikalpakavijñānaiḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ pratīyate |
    • labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca naḥ || 5,8.78 ||
    • (p.334)nanu cāsati sambandhe sati vānavadhārite |
    • gamyajñānam idaṃ vākyaṃ prasajyetāpramāṇakam || 5,8.79 ||
    • sambandhasya pramāṇatvaṃ sthitaṃ kiñceśvarājñayā |
    • pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgater vinā || 5,8.80 ||
    • astīndriyārthasambandhas tatra cen nānapekṣaṇāt |
    • na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate || 5,8.81 ||
    • yenāpi tu nirūpyeta paścād anubhavād asau |
    • na syād eva pramāṇāṅgam asatā tulya eva saḥ || 5,8.82 ||
    • aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣuḥśrotre ca te yathā |
    • tajjñānasya pramāṇatvam icchanty evaṃ bhaviṣyati || 5,8.83 ||
    • tasmād asattve sattve vā sambandhasya yad eva naḥ |
    • jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñānaṃ tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā || 5,8.84 ||
    • (p.335)na cāpy asyāḥ pramāṇatve kaścid vipratipadyate |
    • bhedābhede visaṃvādaḥ kṛtas tatra ca nirṇayaḥ || 5,8.85 ||
    • kṛte yatra ca sambandhād buddhir eva na jāyate |
    • tatra ki kriyatāṃ so 'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam || 5,8.86 ||
    • smṛtyā śrutir yā parikalpyate 'smin liṅgādibhir yā viniyojikā ca |
    • phalādibhir yat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācid asti || 5,8.87 ||
    • tat sarvam ityādy asamañjasaṃ syān na cediyaṃ syād anumānato 'nyā |
    • evaṃsvabhāvāpy anumānaśabdaṃ labheta ced asti yathepsitaṃ naḥ || 5,8.88 ||
pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto yatrārtho nānyathā bhavet | adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayed anyaṃ sārthāpattir udāhṛtā || 5,8.1 ||

p.5, l.8.2

dṛṣṭaḥ pañcabhir apy asmād bhedenoktā śrutodbhavā | pramāṇagrāhiṇītvena yasmāt pūrvavilakṣaṇā || 5,8.2 ||

p.5, l.8.3

tatra pratyakṣato jñānād dāhād dahanaśaktatā | vahner anumitāt sūrye yānāt tacchaktiyogyatā || 5,8.3 ||

p.5, l.8.4

śrutārthāpattir atraiva parastād abhidhāsyate | gavayopamitā yā gaus tajjñānagrāhyatā matā || 5,8.4 ||

p.5, l.8.5

abhidhānaprasiddhyartham arthāpattyāvabodhitāt | śabde bodhakasāmarthyāt tannityatvaprakalpanam || 5,8.5 ||

p.5, l.8.6

abhidhā nānyathā sidhyed iti vācakaśaktatām | arthāpattyāvagamyaivaṃ tadananyagateḥ punaḥ || 5,8.6 ||

p.5, l.8.7

arthāpattyantareṇaiva śabdanityatvaniścayaḥ | darśanasya parārthatvād ity asminn abhidhāsyate || 5,8.7 ||

p.5, l.8.8

pramāṇābhāvanirṇītacaitrābhāvaviśeṣitāt | gehāc caitrabahirbhāvasiddhir yā tv iha darśitā || 5,8.8 ||

p.5, l.8.9

tām abhāvotthitām anyām arthāpattim udāharet | pakṣadoṣeṣu cānyāsāmudāharaṇavistaraḥ || 5,8.9 ||

p.5, l.8.10

abhāvāvagatāc caitrād bahirbhāvasya sūcanam | pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvād bhinnaivāpy anumānataḥ || 5,8.10 ||

p.5, l.8.11

bahirdeśaviśiṣṭe 'rthe deśe vā tadviśeṣite | prameye yo gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmas tv asau katham || 5,8.11 ||

p.5, l.8.12

tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ tu gṛhaṃ dharmo na kasyacit | gṛhābhāvaviśiṣṭas tu tadāsau na pratīyate || 5,8.12 ||

p.5, l.8.13

gamyate tu gṛhaṃ tatra na ca caitraḥ pratīyate | na cātrādarśanaṃ hetur yathābhāve 'bhidhāsyate || 5,8.13 ||

p.5, l.8.14

tena veśmanyadṛṣṭatvād iti hetur na kalpyate | adarśanād abhāve ca prameyasyāvadhārite || 5,8.14 ||

p.5, l.8.15

bahirbhāvamatir nāsau tenādarśanahetukā | caitrābhāvasya hetutvaṃ gehe 'bhāvaś ca saṃsthitaḥ || 5,8.15 ||

p.5, l.8.16

pūrvaṃ na cāgṛhītasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameyatā | na cātra bāhyadeśo vā caitro vā gṛhyate purā || 5,8.16 ||

p.5, l.8.17

nadīpūreṇa yā vṛṣṭir upariṣṭāt pratīyate | deśe katham adṛṣṭe tu pakṣadharmatvasambhavaḥ || 5,8.17 ||

p.5, l.8.18

vṛṣṭimatparadeśatvaṃ nadīpuravato 'tra tu | deśasya pratipadyante yadvārthāpattir eva sā || 5,8.18 ||

p.5, l.8.19

jīvataś ca gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmo 'tra kalpyate | tatsaṃvittir bahirbhāvaṃ na cābuddhvopajāyate || 5,8.19 ||

p.5, l.8.20

agnimattānapekṣā tu dhūmavattā pratīyate | na tadgrahaṇavelāyām agnyadhīnaṃ hi kiñcana || 5,8.20 ||

p.5, l.8.21

gehābhāvas tu yaḥ śuddho vidyamānatvavarjitaḥ | sa mṛteṣv api dṛṣṭatvād bahirvṛtter na sādhakaḥ || 5,8.21 ||

p.5, l.8.22

vidyamānatvasaṃsṛṣṭagṛhābhāvadhiyānayā | gehād utkālitaś caitro vidyate bahir eva hi || 5,8.22 ||

p.5, l.8.23

gehābhāvatvamātraṃ tu yat svatantraṃ pratīyate | na tāvatā bahirbhāvaś caitrasyaivāvadhāryate || 5,8.23 ||

p.5, l.8.24

siddhe sadbhāvavijñāne gehābhāvadhiyātra tu | gehād utkālitā sattā bahir evāvatiṣṭhate || 5,8.24 ||

p.5, l.8.25

tenāsya nirapekṣasya vyabhicāro mṛtādinā | yasya tv avyabhicāritvaṃ na tato 'nyat pratīyate || 5,8.25 ||

p.5, l.8.26

tasmāt pratyakṣato gehe caitrābhāve hy abhāvataḥ | jñāte yat sattvavijñānaṃ tad evedaṃ bahiḥ sthitam || 5,8.26 ||

p.5, l.8.27

pakṣadharmātmalābhāya bahirbhāvaḥ praveśitaḥ | tadviśiṣṭo 'numeyaḥ syāt pakṣadharmānvayādibhiḥ || 5,8.27 ||

p.5, l.8.28

pakṣadharmādivijñānaṃ bahiḥ sambodhato yadi | taiś ca tadbodhato 'vaśyam anyonyāśrayatā bhavet || 5,8.28 ||

p.5, l.8.29

anyathānupapattau tu prameyānupraveśitā | tādrūpyeṇaiva vijñānān na doṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ || 5,8.29 ||

p.5, l.8.30

avinābhāvitā cātra tadaiva parikalpyate | na prāg avadhṛtety evaṃ saty apy eṣā na kāraṇam || 5,8.30 ||

p.5, l.8.31

gṛhābhāvabahirbhāvau na ca dṛṣṭau niyogataḥ | sāhitye 'pi pramāṇaṃ ca tayor anyan na vidyate || 5,8.31 ||

p.5, l.8.32

anyathānupapattyaiva hy ekenānyat pratīyate | tathā na kalpyate tac cet sāhityaṃ na pratīyate || 5,8.32 ||

p.5, l.8.33

tena sambandhavelāyāṃ sambandhyanyataro dhruvam | arthāpattyāvagantavyaḥ paścād asty anumānatā || 5,8.33 ||

p.5, l.8.34

gṛhadvāri sthito yas tu bahirbhāvaṃ prakalpayet | yadaikasminn ayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate || 5,8.34 ||

p.5, l.8.35

tadāpy avidyamānatvaṃ na sarvatra pratīyate | na caikadeśe nāstitvād vyāptir hetor bhaviṣyati || 5,8.35 ||

p.5, l.8.36

nanv atrāvidyamānatvaṃ gamyate 'nupalabdhitaḥ | sā cāprayatnasādhyatvād ekasthasyaiva sidhyati || 5,8.36 ||

p.5, l.8.37

naitayānupalabdhyātra vastvabhāvaḥ pratīyate | taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣv asti satsv api || 5,8.37 ||

p.5, l.8.38

gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yady artho nopalabhyate | tato 'nyakāraṇābhāvād asann ity avagamyate || 5,8.38 ||

p.5, l.8.39

nanu cāgnyādyabhāve 'pi dhūmādivyatirekiṇām | taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati || 5,8.39 ||

p.5, l.8.40

yasya vastvantarābhāvaḥ prameyas tasya duṣyati | mama tv adṛṣṭamātreṇa gamakaḥ sahacāriṇaḥ || 5,8.40 ||

p.5, l.8.41

nanv evam itaratrāpi sambandho 'nupalabdhitaḥ | caitrābhāvasya bhāvena dṛṣṭatvād upapadyate || 5,8.41 ||

p.5, l.8.42

sāhitye mitadeśatvāt prasiddhe cāgnidhūmayoḥ | vyatirekasya cādṛṣṭer gamakatvaṃ prakalpyate || 5,8.42 ||

p.5, l.8.43

iha sāhityam evedam ekasya sahabhāvinaḥ | anantadeśavarttitvān na tāvad upapadyate || 5,8.43 ||

p.5, l.8.44

nanu deśāntaraṃ śūnyaṃ caitreṇaivaṃ pratīyate | taddeśavyatiriktatvāt samīpasthitadeśavat || 5,8.44 ||

p.5, l.8.45

viruddhāvyabhicāritvaṃ tadvad eva hi gamyate | samīpadeśabhinnatvāt caitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavat || 5,8.45 ||

p.5, l.8.46

puruṣasya tu kārtsnyena yad ekatropalambhanam | tasyānyathā na siddhiḥ syād ity anyeṣv asya nāstitā || 5,8.46 ||

p.5, l.8.47

tenārthāpattipūrvatvam atra yatra ca kāraṇe | kāryādarśanataḥ śakter astitvaṃ sampratīyate || 5,8.47 ||

p.5, l.8.48

kāryasya nanu liṅgatvaṃ na sambandhānapekṣaṇāt | dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktir gamyeta nānyathā || 5,8.48 ||

p.5, l.8.49

taddarśane tadānīṃ ca pratyakṣāder asambhavāt | arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet || 5,8.49 ||

p.5, l.8.50

anumānād abhinnatvān noktau jayaparājayau | vadhyaghātakabhāvena yau sarpanakulādiṣu || 5,8.50 ||

p.5, l.8.51

pīno divā na bhuṅkte cety evamādivacaḥ śrutau | rātribhojanavijñānaṃ śrutārthāpattir ucyate || 5,8.51 ||

p.5, l.8.52

tām arthagocarāṃ kecid apare śabdagocarām | kalpayanty āgamāc cainām abhinnāṃ pratijānate || 5,8.52 ||

p.5, l.8.53

prāyaśaś cānayā vede vyavahāro vyavasthitaḥ | so 'vaidikaḥ prasajyeta yady eṣā bhidyate tataḥ || 5,8.53 ||

p.5, l.8.54

vacanasya śrutasyaiva so 'py arthaḥ kaiścid āśritaḥ | tadarthopaplutasyānyair iṣṭo vākyāntarasya tu || 5,8.54 ||

p.5, l.8.55

na tāvac chrūyamāṇasya vacaso 'rtho 'yam iṣyate | na hy anekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā || 5,8.55 ||

p.5, l.8.56

padārthānvayarūpeṇa vākyārtho hi pratīyate | na rātryādipadārthaś ca divāvākyena gamyate || 5,8.56 ||

p.5, l.8.57

na divādipadārthānāṃ saṃsargo rātribhojanam | na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam || 5,8.57 ||

p.5, l.8.58

anyārthavyāpṛtatvāc ca na dvitīyārthakalpanā | tasmād vākyāntareṇāyaṃ buddhisthena pratīyate || 5,8.58 ||

p.5, l.8.59

tasya cāgamikatve 'pi yat tad vākyaṃ pratīyate | pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet || 5,8.59 ||

p.5, l.8.60

na hy anuccārite vākye pratyakṣaṃ tāvad iṣyate | nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit || 5,8.60 ||

p.5, l.8.61

yadi tv anupalabdhe 'pi sambandhe liṅgateṣyate | taduccāraṇamātreṇa sarvavākyamatir bhavet || 5,8.61 ||

p.5, l.8.62

na cārthāpattigamyāni sarvaiḥ sarvavacāṃsi hi | sambaddhāny upalabdhāni yena teṣv anumā bhavet || 5,8.62 ||

p.5, l.8.63

na ca sattānumānena viśeṣo vānumīyate | iha vākyaviśeṣasya sattaiva tv avagamyate || 5,8.63 ||

p.5, l.8.64

pūrvasiddhaḥ svatantro 'rthaḥ svatantreṇa viśeṣitaḥ | dharmādharmaviśiṣṭo 'tra nānumeyaḥ pratīyate || 5,8.64 ||

p.5, l.8.65

atha śrutasya vākyasya mīyate tadviśiṣṭatā | tataḥ pakṣo 'bhyupetaḥ syād aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ || 5,8.65 ||

p.5, l.8.66

kiñ ca liṅgāntarābhāvād etasya yadi liṅgatā | pratijñārthaikadeśatvaṃ padavat te prasajyate || 5,8.66 ||

p.5, l.8.67

tadvad eva nirākāryā vacaso dharmadharmitā | nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā || 5,8.67 ||

p.5, l.8.68

kriyākārakasambandhād ṛte nāsti tu dharmatā | avācakatayā caitan na dharmo viṣayātmanā || 5,8.68 ||

p.5, l.8.69

pratīter vācakatvaṃ cet prasaktānekaśaktitā | anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet || 5,8.69 ||

p.5, l.8.70

padārthair api tadvākyaṃ nāsambandhāt pratīyate | sāmānyānyanyathāsiddher viśeṣaṃ gamayanti hi || 5,8.70 ||

p.5, l.8.71

na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcin na sidhyati | na cāpy anyaḥ prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau || 5,8.71 ||

p.5, l.8.72

athaitad vāci kalpyeta vākyam anyat tathaiva ca | prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate || 5,8.72 ||

p.5, l.8.73

tataś ca prathamād eva varaṃ jñātum asaṅgatāt | anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā || 5,8.73 ||

p.5, l.8.74

śrutavākyena sādṛśyaṃ nāśrutasyāsti kiñcana | tasmād anupamānatvam arthasyāpy anayā diśā || 5,8.74 ||

p.5, l.8.75

upamānatvaliṅgatve vākyaṃ prati nivārite | arthe 'pi caivam eva syāt, tasmāt pūrveṣv asambhavaḥ || 5,8.75 ||

p.5, l.8.76

ataḥ śrutasya vākyasya yad arthapratipādanam | tadātmalābha eva syād vinā nety etad iṣyate || 5,8.76 ||

p.5, l.8.77

etadarthād vinā nāyam ity arthaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate | vākyārthavac ca kiṃ nāyam āgamārthaḥ pratīyate || 5,8.77 ||

p.5, l.8.78

savikalpakavijñānaiḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ pratīyate | labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca naḥ || 5,8.78 ||

p.5, l.8.79

nanu cāsati sambandhe sati vānavadhārite | gamyajñānam idaṃ vākyaṃ prasajyetāpramāṇakam || 5,8.79 ||

p.5, l.8.80

sambandhasya pramāṇatvaṃ sthitaṃ kiñceśvarājñayā | pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgater vinā || 5,8.80 ||

p.5, l.8.81

astīndriyārthasambandhas tatra cen nānapekṣaṇāt | na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate || 5,8.81 ||

p.5, l.8.82

yenāpi tu nirūpyeta paścād anubhavād asau | na syād eva pramāṇāṅgam asatā tulya eva saḥ || 5,8.82 ||

p.5, l.8.83

aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣuḥśrotre ca te yathā | tajjñānasya pramāṇatvam icchanty evaṃ bhaviṣyati || 5,8.83 ||

p.5, l.8.84

tasmād asattve sattve vā sambandhasya yad eva naḥ | jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñānaṃ tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā || 5,8.84 ||

p.5, l.8.85

na cāpy asyāḥ pramāṇatve kaścid vipratipadyate | bhedābhede visaṃvādaḥ kṛtas tatra ca nirṇayaḥ || 5,8.85 ||

p.5, l.8.86

kṛte yatra ca sambandhād buddhir eva na jāyate | tatra ki kriyatāṃ so 'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam || 5,8.86 ||

p.5, l.8.87

smṛtyā śrutir yā parikalpyate 'smin liṅgādibhir yā viniyojikā ca | phalādibhir yat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācid asti || 5,8.87 ||

p.5, l.8.88

tat sarvam ityādy asamañjasaṃ syān na cediyaṃ syād anumānato 'nyā | evaṃsvabhāvāpy anumānaśabdaṃ labheta ced asti yathepsitaṃ naḥ || 5,8.88 ||

§ 5,9 abhāvapariccheda ABH

p.5, l.9.1

    • pramāṇapañcakaṃ yatra vasturūpe na jāyate |
    • (p.336)vastusattāvabodhārthaṃ tatrābhāvapramāṇatā || 5,9.1 ||
    • vastvasaṅkarasiddhiś ca tatprāmāṇyasamāśrayā |
    • kṣīre dadhyādi yan nāsti prāgabhāvaḥ sa ucyate || 5,9.2 ||
    • nāstitā payaso dadhni pradhvaṃsābhāva iṣyate |
    • gavi yo 'śvādyabhāvas tu so 'nyonyābhāva ucyate || 5,9.3 ||
    • śiraso 'vayavā nimnā vṛddhikāṭhinyavarjitāḥ |
    • śaśaśṛṅgādirūpeṇa so 'tyantābhāva ucyate || 5,9.4 ||
    • kṣīre dadhi bhaved evaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭaḥ |
    • śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtir ātmani || 5,9.5 ||
    • apsu gandho rasaś cāgnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha |
    • vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na ced asya pramāṇatā || 5,9.6 ||
    • na ca syād vyavahāro 'yaṃ kāraṇādivibhāgataḥ |
    • prāgabhāvādibhedena nābhāvo bhidyate yadi || 5,9.7 ||
    • na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā |
    • (p.337)kāryādīnām abhāvaḥ ko yo 'bhāvaḥ kāraṇāditaḥ || 5,9.8 ||
    • yadvānuvṛttivyāvṛttibuddhigrāhyo yatas tv ayam |
    • tasmād gavādivad vastu, prameyatvāc ca gamyate || 5,9.9 ||
    • na caupacārikatvaṃ vā bhrāntir vāpi yadṛcchayā |
    • bhavaty ato na sāmānyaviśeṣātmakatā mṛṣā || 5,9.10 ||
    • pratyakṣāder anutpattiḥ pramāṇābhāva ucyate |
    • sātmanaḥ pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vākyavastuni || 5,9.11 ||
    • svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ nityaṃ sadasadātmake |
    • vastuni jñāyate kaiś cid rūpaṃ kiñ cit kadā cana || 5,9.12 ||
    • (p.338)yasya yatra yadodbhūtir jighṛkṣā vopajāyate |
    • cetyate 'nubhavas tasya tena ca vyapadiśyate || 5,9.13 ||
    • tasyopakārakatvena varttate 'śastadetaraḥ |
    • ubhayor api saṃvittāv ubhayānugamo 'sti hi || 5,9.14 ||
    • ayam eveti yo hy eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ |
    • naiṣa vastvantarābhāvasaṃvittyanugamād ṛte || 5,9.15 ||
    • (p.339)nāstīty api ca saṃvittir na vastvanugamād ṛte |
    • jñānaṃ na jāyate kiñ cid upaṣṭambhanavarjitam || 5,9.16 ||
    • pratyakṣādyavatāras tu bhāvāṃśo gṛhyate yadā |
    • vyāpāras tadanutpatter abhāvāṃśe jighṛkṣite || 5,9.17 ||
    • na tāvad indriyair eṣā nāstīty utpadyate matiḥ |
    • (p.340)bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādindriyasya hi || 5,9.18 ||
    • nanu bhāvād abhinnatvāt samprayogo 'sti tena ca |
    • na hy atyantam abhedo 'sti rūpādivad ihāpi naḥ || 5,9.19 ||
    • dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥ sthite |
    • udbhavābhibhavātmatvād grahaṇaṃ cāvatiṣṭhate || 5,9.20 ||
    • idam eva nimittaṃ ca vivekasya pratīyate |
    • bhāvābhāvadhiyor akṣaiḥ sambandho 'kṣānapekṣaṇam || 5,9.21 ||
    • rūpāder api bhedaṃ ca ke cid grāhakabhedataḥ |
    • varṇayanti yathaikasya puṃsaḥ putrādirūpatām || 5,9.22 ||
    • buddhimātrakṛto bhedo rūpādau nityam eva hi |
    • (p.341)na ca deśādyabhinnānāṃ samudāyāvakalpanā || 5,9.23 ||
    • sadguṇadravyarūpeṇa rūpāder ekateṣyate |
    • svarūpāpekṣayā caiṣāṃ parasparavibhinnatā || 5,9.24 ||
    • yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi |
    • sadasadrūpatā buddher bhaved anyataratra naḥ || 5,9.25 ||
    • tatsambandhe sad ityevaṃ tadrūpatvaṃ pratīyate |
    • nāsty atredam itīdaṃ tu tadasaṃyogahetukam || 5,9.26 ||
    • (p.342)gṛhītvā vastusadbhāvaṃ smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam |
    • mānasaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ jāyate 'kṣānapekṣaṇāt || 5,9.27 ||
    • (p.343)svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭvāpi paścāt kiñ cit smarann api |
    • tatrānyanāstitāṃ pṛṣṭas tadaiva pratipadyate || 5,9.28 ||
    • na cāpy atrānumānatvaṃ liṅgābhāvāt pratīyate |
    • bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nājighṛkṣaṇāt || 5,9.29 ||
    • abhāvāvagater janma bhāvāṃśe hy ajighṛkṣite |
    • (p.344)tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate matiḥ || 5,9.30 ||
    • na caiṣa prakṣadharmatvaṃ padavat pratipadyate |
    • saha sarvair abhāvaiś ca bhāvo naikāntato gataḥ || 5,9.31 ||
    • kva cid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadā cana |
    • tasyābhāvo 'pi tatraiva kadā cid avagamyate || 5,9.32 ||
    • yatrāpy adṛṣṭapūrvatvaṃ yadabhāvasya tatra ca |
    • tadabhāvamatir dṛṣṭā sambandhe 'kṣānapekṣayā || 5,9.33 ||
    • kasya cid yadi bhāvasya syād abhāvena kena cit |
    • sambandhadarśanam, tatra sarvamānaṃ prasajyate || 5,9.34 ||
    • gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naivābhāve 'nyavastunaḥ |
    • sarvatra matir ityevaṃ vyabhicārād aliṅgatā || 5,9.35 ||
    • (p.345)sambandhe gṛhyamāṇe ca sambandhigrahaṇaṃ dhruvam |
    • tatrābhāvamatiḥ kena pramāṇenopajāyate || 5,9.36 ||
    • tadānīṃ na hi liṅgena sambandhigrahaṇaṃ bhavet |
    • tatrāvaśyam abhāvasya pramāṇāntarato gatiḥ || 5,9.37 ||
    • pratyakṣāder anutpattir na tu liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati |
    • na viśeṣaṇasambandhas tasyāḥ sāmānyato bhavet || 5,9.38 ||
    • na cāpy abhāvasāmānye pramāṇam upajāyate |
    • vyabhicārād viśeṣās tu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā || 5,9.39 ||
    • (p.346)na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ gṛhyate ced asāv api |
    • abhāvatvād abhāvena gṛhyetānyena hetunā || 5,9.40 ||
    • sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā |
    • tadgṛhītir hi liṅgena syād anyenety anantatā || 5,9.41 ||
    • liṅgābhāve tathaiva syād anavastheyam ity ataḥ |
    • kvāpy asya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam || 5,9.42 ||
    • nāstīti dhīḥ phalaṃ caiṣā pratyakṣāder ajanmanaḥ |
    • tasyaiva ca pramāṇatvam ānantaryāt pratīyate || 5,9.43 ||
    • trilakṣaṇena yā buddhir janyate sānumeṣyate |
    • na cānutpattirūpasya kāraṇāpekṣitā kva cit || 5,9.44 ||
    • mānaṃ katham abhāvaś cet, prameyaṃ cāsya kīdṛśam |
    • meyo yadvadabhāvo hi mānam apy evam iṣyatām || 5,9.45 ||
    • (p.347)bhāvātmake tathā meye nābhāvasya pramāṇatā |
    • tathābhāvaprameye 'pi na bhāvasya pramāṇatā || 5,9.46 ||
    • bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam |
    • paricchedaphalatvād dhi prāmāṇyaṃ syād dvayor api || 5,9.47 ||
    • yadi cāsya pramāṇatvam abhāvatvena neṣyate |
    • vastunaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ hi dṛṣṭam ity abhimānitā || 5,9.48 ||
    • na liṅgatvaprameyatve bhavetāṃ tadvad eva hi |
    • tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati || 5,9.49 ||
    • pramāṇānām anutpatter nābhāvasyāpi dharmatā |
    • yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyāḥ sambandho naiva vidyate || 5,9.50 ||
    • yo na sannihitas tatra tasya dharmo bhaved iyam |
    • na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt || 5,9.51 ||
    • (p.348)abhāvena tu sambandho bhavet tadviṣayatvataḥ |
    • tajjānād viṣayatvaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate || 5,9.52 ||
    • saṃyogasamavāyādisambandho naiva vidyate |
    • nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam || 5,9.53 ||
    • abhāvaśabdavācyatvāt pratyakṣādeś ca bhidyate |
    • pramāṇānām abhāvo hi prameyāṇām abhāvavat || 5,9.54 ||
    • abhāvo vā pramāṇena svānurūpeṇa mīyate |
    • prameyatvād yathā bhāvas tasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak || 5,9.55 ||
    • karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalaiḥ samastaiḥ sarvair yathāvac ca yadaṅgakāṇḍaiḥ |
    • na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ ca nāṅgaṃ tadetat prabhavaṃ kratūnām || 5,9.56 ||
    • yuktyāgamābhyām iti tarkito 'yaṃ pramāṇaṣaṭkaṃ pravibhajya bhāṣye |
    • tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayam iṣṭam anyair bhedo na tasyety api siddham etat || 5,9.57 ||
    • (p.349)iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyāsahasrānmatir aviyutabhāvāt sānumānād abhinnā |
    • jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityam aitihyam uktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat || 5,9.58 ||
pramāṇapañcakaṃ yatra vasturūpe na jāyate | vastusattāvabodhārthaṃ tatrābhāvapramāṇatā || 5,9.1 ||

p.5, l.9.2

vastvasaṅkarasiddhiś ca tatprāmāṇyasamāśrayā | kṣīre dadhyādi yan nāsti prāgabhāvaḥ sa ucyate || 5,9.2 ||

p.5, l.9.3

nāstitā payaso dadhni pradhvaṃsābhāva iṣyate | gavi yo 'śvādyabhāvas tu so 'nyonyābhāva ucyate || 5,9.3 ||

p.5, l.9.4

śiraso 'vayavā nimnā vṛddhikāṭhinyavarjitāḥ | śaśaśṛṅgādirūpeṇa so 'tyantābhāva ucyate || 5,9.4 ||

p.5, l.9.5

kṣīre dadhi bhaved evaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭaḥ | śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtir ātmani || 5,9.5 ||

p.5, l.9.6

apsu gandho rasaś cāgnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha | vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na ced asya pramāṇatā || 5,9.6 ||

p.5, l.9.7

na ca syād vyavahāro 'yaṃ kāraṇādivibhāgataḥ | prāgabhāvādibhedena nābhāvo bhidyate yadi || 5,9.7 ||

p.5, l.9.8

na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā | kāryādīnām abhāvaḥ ko yo 'bhāvaḥ kāraṇāditaḥ || 5,9.8 ||

p.5, l.9.9

yadvānuvṛttivyāvṛttibuddhigrāhyo yatas tv ayam | tasmād gavādivad vastu, prameyatvāc ca gamyate || 5,9.9 ||

p.5, l.9.10

na caupacārikatvaṃ vā bhrāntir vāpi yadṛcchayā | bhavaty ato na sāmānyaviśeṣātmakatā mṛṣā || 5,9.10 ||

p.5, l.9.11

pratyakṣāder anutpattiḥ pramāṇābhāva ucyate | sātmanaḥ pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vākyavastuni || 5,9.11 ||

p.5, l.9.12

svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ nityaṃ sadasadātmake | vastuni jñāyate kaiś cid rūpaṃ kiñ cit kadā cana || 5,9.12 ||

p.5, l.9.13

yasya yatra yadodbhūtir jighṛkṣā vopajāyate | cetyate 'nubhavas tasya tena ca vyapadiśyate || 5,9.13 ||

p.5, l.9.14

tasyopakārakatvena varttate 'śastadetaraḥ | ubhayor api saṃvittāv ubhayānugamo 'sti hi || 5,9.14 ||

p.5, l.9.15

ayam eveti yo hy eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ | naiṣa vastvantarābhāvasaṃvittyanugamād ṛte || 5,9.15 ||

p.5, l.9.16

nāstīty api ca saṃvittir na vastvanugamād ṛte | jñānaṃ na jāyate kiñ cid upaṣṭambhanavarjitam || 5,9.16 ||

p.5, l.9.17

pratyakṣādyavatāras tu bhāvāṃśo gṛhyate yadā | vyāpāras tadanutpatter abhāvāṃśe jighṛkṣite || 5,9.17 ||

p.5, l.9.18

na tāvad indriyair eṣā nāstīty utpadyate matiḥ | bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādindriyasya hi || 5,9.18 ||

p.5, l.9.19

nanu bhāvād abhinnatvāt samprayogo 'sti tena ca | na hy atyantam abhedo 'sti rūpādivad ihāpi naḥ || 5,9.19 ||

p.5, l.9.20

dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥ sthite | udbhavābhibhavātmatvād grahaṇaṃ cāvatiṣṭhate || 5,9.20 ||

p.5, l.9.21

idam eva nimittaṃ ca vivekasya pratīyate | bhāvābhāvadhiyor akṣaiḥ sambandho 'kṣānapekṣaṇam || 5,9.21 ||

p.5, l.9.22

rūpāder api bhedaṃ ca ke cid grāhakabhedataḥ | varṇayanti yathaikasya puṃsaḥ putrādirūpatām || 5,9.22 ||

p.5, l.9.23

buddhimātrakṛto bhedo rūpādau nityam eva hi | na ca deśādyabhinnānāṃ samudāyāvakalpanā || 5,9.23 ||

p.5, l.9.24

sadguṇadravyarūpeṇa rūpāder ekateṣyate | svarūpāpekṣayā caiṣāṃ parasparavibhinnatā || 5,9.24 ||

p.5, l.9.25

yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi | sadasadrūpatā buddher bhaved anyataratra naḥ || 5,9.25 ||

p.5, l.9.26

tatsambandhe sad ityevaṃ tadrūpatvaṃ pratīyate | nāsty atredam itīdaṃ tu tadasaṃyogahetukam || 5,9.26 ||

p.5, l.9.27

gṛhītvā vastusadbhāvaṃ smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam | mānasaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ jāyate 'kṣānapekṣaṇāt || 5,9.27 ||

p.5, l.9.28

svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭvāpi paścāt kiñ cit smarann api | tatrānyanāstitāṃ pṛṣṭas tadaiva pratipadyate || 5,9.28 ||

p.5, l.9.29

na cāpy atrānumānatvaṃ liṅgābhāvāt pratīyate | bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nājighṛkṣaṇāt || 5,9.29 ||

p.5, l.9.30

abhāvāvagater janma bhāvāṃśe hy ajighṛkṣite | tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate matiḥ || 5,9.30 ||

p.5, l.9.31

na caiṣa prakṣadharmatvaṃ padavat pratipadyate | saha sarvair abhāvaiś ca bhāvo naikāntato gataḥ || 5,9.31 ||

p.5, l.9.32

kva cid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadā cana | tasyābhāvo 'pi tatraiva kadā cid avagamyate || 5,9.32 ||

p.5, l.9.33

yatrāpy adṛṣṭapūrvatvaṃ yadabhāvasya tatra ca | tadabhāvamatir dṛṣṭā sambandhe 'kṣānapekṣayā || 5,9.33 ||

p.5, l.9.34

kasya cid yadi bhāvasya syād abhāvena kena cit | sambandhadarśanam, tatra sarvamānaṃ prasajyate || 5,9.34 ||

p.5, l.9.35

gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naivābhāve 'nyavastunaḥ | sarvatra matir ityevaṃ vyabhicārād aliṅgatā || 5,9.35 ||

p.5, l.9.36

sambandhe gṛhyamāṇe ca sambandhigrahaṇaṃ dhruvam | tatrābhāvamatiḥ kena pramāṇenopajāyate || 5,9.36 ||

p.5, l.9.37

tadānīṃ na hi liṅgena sambandhigrahaṇaṃ bhavet | tatrāvaśyam abhāvasya pramāṇāntarato gatiḥ || 5,9.37 ||

p.5, l.9.38

pratyakṣāder anutpattir na tu liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati | na viśeṣaṇasambandhas tasyāḥ sāmānyato bhavet || 5,9.38 ||

p.5, l.9.39

na cāpy abhāvasāmānye pramāṇam upajāyate | vyabhicārād viśeṣās tu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā || 5,9.39 ||

p.5, l.9.40

na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ gṛhyate ced asāv api | abhāvatvād abhāvena gṛhyetānyena hetunā || 5,9.40 ||

p.5, l.9.41

sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā | tadgṛhītir hi liṅgena syād anyenety anantatā || 5,9.41 ||

p.5, l.9.42

liṅgābhāve tathaiva syād anavastheyam ity ataḥ | kvāpy asya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam || 5,9.42 ||

p.5, l.9.43

nāstīti dhīḥ phalaṃ caiṣā pratyakṣāder ajanmanaḥ | tasyaiva ca pramāṇatvam ānantaryāt pratīyate || 5,9.43 ||

p.5, l.9.44

trilakṣaṇena yā buddhir janyate sānumeṣyate | na cānutpattirūpasya kāraṇāpekṣitā kva cit || 5,9.44 ||

p.5, l.9.45

mānaṃ katham abhāvaś cet, prameyaṃ cāsya kīdṛśam | meyo yadvadabhāvo hi mānam apy evam iṣyatām || 5,9.45 ||

p.5, l.9.46

bhāvātmake tathā meye nābhāvasya pramāṇatā | tathābhāvaprameye 'pi na bhāvasya pramāṇatā || 5,9.46 ||

p.5, l.9.47

bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam | paricchedaphalatvād dhi prāmāṇyaṃ syād dvayor api || 5,9.47 ||

p.5, l.9.48

yadi cāsya pramāṇatvam abhāvatvena neṣyate | vastunaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ hi dṛṣṭam ity abhimānitā || 5,9.48 ||

p.5, l.9.49

na liṅgatvaprameyatve bhavetāṃ tadvad eva hi | tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati || 5,9.49 ||

p.5, l.9.50

pramāṇānām anutpatter nābhāvasyāpi dharmatā | yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyāḥ sambandho naiva vidyate || 5,9.50 ||

p.5, l.9.51

yo na sannihitas tatra tasya dharmo bhaved iyam | na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt || 5,9.51 ||

p.5, l.9.52

abhāvena tu sambandho bhavet tadviṣayatvataḥ | tajjānād viṣayatvaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate || 5,9.52 ||

p.5, l.9.53

saṃyogasamavāyādisambandho naiva vidyate | nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam || 5,9.53 ||

p.5, l.9.54

abhāvaśabdavācyatvāt pratyakṣādeś ca bhidyate | pramāṇānām abhāvo hi prameyāṇām abhāvavat || 5,9.54 ||

p.5, l.9.55

abhāvo vā pramāṇena svānurūpeṇa mīyate | prameyatvād yathā bhāvas tasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak || 5,9.55 ||

p.5, l.9.56

karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalaiḥ samastaiḥ sarvair yathāvac ca yadaṅgakāṇḍaiḥ | na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ ca nāṅgaṃ tadetat prabhavaṃ kratūnām || 5,9.56 ||

p.5, l.9.57

yuktyāgamābhyām iti tarkito 'yaṃ pramāṇaṣaṭkaṃ pravibhajya bhāṣye | tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayam iṣṭam anyair bhedo na tasyety api siddham etat || 5,9.57 ||

p.5, l.9.58

iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyāsahasrānmatir aviyutabhāvāt sānumānād abhinnā | jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityam aitihyam uktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat || 5,9.58 ||

§ 5,10 citrākṣepavāda CAV

p.5, l.10.1

    • paralokaphalāḥ pūrvam ākṣiptāś codanāḥ paraiḥ |
    • idānīm aihikākṣepaḥ, (p.350)sūtrakāreṇa codyate || 5,10.1 ||
    • citrāpaśuphalatvādiviṣayāś codaṇā mṛṣā |
    • pratyakṣādyadhikāre 'pi tair arthāsaṅgatir yataḥ || 5,10.2 ||
    • yadīdṛk tanmṛṣā dṛṣṭaṃ vipralipsor yathā vacaḥ |
    • nadītīre phalānīti tatrādṛśyāni tāni cet || 5,10.3 ||
    • na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānaḥ |
    • snānabhujyādivat te 'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā || 5,10.4 ||
    • tadutpattāvasadbhāvāt svarge tṛptisukhādivat |
    • vaidharmyeṇobhayatrāpi bhavetāṃ sukham ardane || 5,10.5 ||
    • ānantaryam ayuktaṃ cet, (p.351)na sāmarthyāvabodhanāt |
    • śabdaikadeśabhūtena tena tat pratipāditam || 5,10.6 ||
    • kālāntarānupādānāt karmasvābhāvyato 'pi ca |
    • codyamānasya citrāder ānantaryaṃ viśeṣaṇam || 5,10.7 ||
    • atra tāvadasaṃvādo virodhaś cottarasya tu |
    • svargayānaviruddho hi bhasmībhāvo 'tra dṛśyate || 5,10.8 ||
    • yajñāyudhivaco mithyā pratyakṣeṇa virodhataḥ |
    • sādharmyeṇa śilāvākyaṃ vaidharmyeṇāptabhāṣitam || 5,10.9 ||
    • śarīrād yadi cānyaḥ syān nāsau yajñāyudhī bhavet |
    • na cāsya yajamānatvaṃ sadbhāvo 'pi ca durlabhaḥ || 5,10.10 ||
    • (p.352)yadi syād vidhiśabdo 'tra naivādarśanato bhavet |
    • viśeṣo 'syeti bhedena nopāttaṃ syād idaṃ tataḥ || 5,10.11 ||
    • vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya parikalpya hi |
    • virodhaparihāraḥ syād vartamāne 'pi nāsty asau || 5,10.12 ||
    • phalaṃ ca na bhaved evaṃ bhasmībhāvād vidhāv api |
    • tatsāmarthyena yā cānyā kalpanā tāṃ niṣedhati || 5,10.13 ||
    • prāyaś caivamprakāratvam arthavādeṣu dṛśyate |
    • mantreṣu ceti te sarve pakṣīkāryāḥ prayatnataḥ || 5,10.14 ||
    • evaṃ saty agnihotrādivākyeṣv api mṛṣārthatā |
    • vedavākyaikadeśatvāc citrādivacaneṣv api || 5,10.15 ||
